title: adidas Men's Run Falcon 5 Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, well-made, and good value for money, with great arch support and a nice look. The fit and sizing receive mixed feedback - while some find them perfect, others note they run narrow and are not true wide shoes. Durability is also mixed, with some saying they hold up well while others report them falling apart quickly.

Review.review: Very comfortable very good to run with crypto Road flexibility and qualities. The fit in color was amazing. Adidas makes a good item. I recommend Adidas shoes for all runners especially those over the age of 50 you get your miles and worth out of them and they’re very comfortable.

Ortholite is a godsend. I am about two years post-op knee replacement surgery and long time orthotics user. The support, comfort, and wearability is magic on my feet and legs. Traction is strong on different surfaces inside and outside.  As owner of many high end shoes, dress, sneakers, boots, sandles, hikeing boots, dress boots and western boots. Here is a quality shoe that maintains its original look.

I bought these Adidas Run Falcon 5 for myself and overall, I’m very happy with them.They’re comfortable, lightweight, and provide good support for walking or workouts.The only thing I’d note is that they seem to run slightly smaller than expected, so next time I’d go half a size up.✅ Highlights:Comfortable and supportiveClean, versatile designGreat quality for the price⚠️ Heads-up:Consider ordering half a size up for a better fitStill very satisfied and would definitely recommend them.

They are light and comfortable, but they are narrow and feel like they run a little small--the 12.5 I bought feel closer to 12. I've been wearing ASICS for a long time now, sticking with their Kayano models for exercise, and these are definitely more narrow than those. I haven't worn them long enough yet to speak on how much stability they offer, so I might update this when I get to wear them more. For 1/2 to 1/3 of the price of the ASICS I usually buy, these might be my "running errands" shoes and not ones I exercise in or plan to wear when I'm going to be on my feet for long periods of time.

Very comfortable for someone with flat feet for everyday wear and comfort. After having them for almost a year they are still looking good and in good shape. They are good for running, walking, and everyday activities. The color combo goes with nearly all outfits and they fit perfectly. In any weather they keep good traction and stability.

With tax paid $42...and considering what I've paid for other shoes, that price is right.I bought the 10.5 wide even though I don't really have a wide foot. Some said size up, I think 11s would have been good too. If these are wide (don't appear so other than saying it) I'm sure the reg 10.5 would have been too tight.There was mention/reviews of the short shoelaces...yeah, if you use all the holes it will leave you just enough to tie them good. No extra hanging lace to trip on.... Hence, they are jogging shoes!Laces also seem thinner and cheaper than most laces I've seen but also strategic. German Engineering...gotta love itComfortable and look good. Will last 20+ years I suspect, granted my occasional plan of usage.

For what i paid for the shoes, I can honestly say that I am impressed. The saying, you get what you pay for, does not apply here.-They’re easy to put on, you can slip them on-the shoes are comfortable-the shoes have lasted for a long while. Great quality-decent looking.It is for these reasons that I have and will continue to purchase more pairs. I honestly couldn’t be happier with my purchase; it is the best for your dollar type of purchase.
Great shoes. Comfy and durable.

title: adidas Men's Ultraboost 1.0 Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, well-made, and nice-looking, offering great value for money. The fit and sizing receive mixed feedback - while some find them a good fit, others note they run very small and are very narrow. The durability is also mixed, with some saying they last a long time while others report them falling apart. The cushioning receives mixed reviews, with some finding them soft while others say the soles are very hard.

Review.review: This is my second pair of Adidas Ultra Boost DNA shoes and I hope it never gets discontinued!All I can say is Adidas really hit the ballpark with this shoe. I’ve never worn a shoe as multifunctional and durable as Ultra boost DNA.✅Stylish for casual wearing✅Comfortable for traveling✅Walking and running sprintsMy first pair lasted about 2 years. It was the pair of shoes I used to travel, walk, and simply wear for an everyday casual wearing. Just on the walking part alone I put no less than 500 miles.I slip in these when I travel. I can literally wear them for multiple days without worry my feet would eventually start to hurt. Trust me I’ve done 24+ itineraries there’s no other shoe that can match these in comfort. It looks stylish and slick, they never seem out of place.They are soft but will keep you grounded. If you prone to getting your ankles sprained these shoes are perfect. Both, toe box and heel are wide and will keep your ankles from accidentally twisting one way or another.

Not just a nice looking pair of sneakers, this is very comfortable, lightweight and very breathable.  The style is perfect for training for long runs or just taking long walks.  Easy to clean and easy to use.
Great shoes, very comfortable.
Bought these for my son as all he ever wears are Nike AF1's.  Kid couldn't be happier.  He lifts weights and does light running in them and they fit the bill perfectly.
Light weight and comfortable. A little narrower than I'm used to for Adidas.

After one year of use, this is a great shoe. I think it is probably the most comfortable walking shoe out but please for all thats good and holy dont use these as running shoes. They will blister and wear your feet out quick. Knowing that, you will love this shoe.

I've been an ultraboost fan for a decade, and I've owned more than 10 pairs. The all black pair has always been my safe shoe with black jeans for casual looks and they blend in nice for a casual work look too. I bought a pair of the 5x ultraboost about 4 months ago, and within the first month, they were already falling apart. the bottom of the shoe was slowly peeling off, the black around the edge of the base ripped off too, I've never had a pair fall apart so quickly.Fast forward to now, I buy the 1.0 because they're more similarly shaped to ultraboosts I've purchased in the past because I'm going on a long vacation and need great walking shoes. I wore these to a baseball game to break them in and after mostly sitting, my left foot was killing me for a week. I tried loosening them, but no matter what the material under the tongue DRIVES into the top of your foot and hurts so much. That was two weeks ago, and I just told myself I need to break them in... WRONG! They still hurt and my foot is killing me. Money wasted, and now I need to find a new walking shoe because Adidas' quality has completely tanked.

These are amazing. They’re my third pair. They are lightweight, easy to slip on and feel supportive. They hold up nicely too. They are white so they do show dirt easily- you have to stay on top of cleaning them for them to remain bright white. They fit as expected and have a bit of stretch to them. I highly recommend these for a comfortable, fashionable, & supportive style shoe.

title: adidas Women's Run Falcon 5 Sneakers
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, well-made, and appreciate their great arch support, with one customer noting they can stand all day without pain. They are lightweight, stylish, and offer good value for money. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some noting they run bigger than expected.

Review.review: I love these sneakers. They're useful for everything. I have bunions on my feet, and almost all materials bother me, but these don't. They don't squeeze me. They're extremely comfortable. I can wear them for more than 12 hours, and they don't tire me out. The best investment I've made: comfort and quality, and they also look very nice on me.

She absolutely loved these sneakers from the moment she tried them on. The Adidas Run Falcon 5 are the perfect mix of comfort, style, and affordability. They’re super lightweight, and the cushioned sole makes walking or light jogging feel soft and easy—even after hours of wear.She uses them for walks, gym sessions, or just everyday errands, and always gets compliments on how stylish they look. The design is clean, modern, and goes well with almost anything. Plus, they didn’t cause any discomfort, not even on the first wear.The only thing she noticed is that they’re not meant for long-distance runs or very intense workouts, but for casual use, they’re more than enough. She also recommends sticking to your regular size—they fit her just right.

One of the best pair of shoes I have bought in a long time worked a 8 hour shift in them and my feet aren’t even sore and I have plantar fasciitis and neuropathy in my feet !  my feet feel awesome.. i got my normal size 9.5 and the fit great !! Just wipe them down with a damp cloth and you’re good to go !! Highly recommend

I have paid $100+ for most of my running shoes but, I was shocked, given their much lower price, to find these shoes as comfortable, supportive, and lightweight as they are.  My “normal” size fit me and, while they are a standard black and white, these shoes have a unique look as the base of the shoe is white with black speckles.
When they said cloud foam they were true. The comfort is unbeatable. The color is true to add and it fits comfortably. I use it for running and no regrets.
Look good  Comfortable and nice that these shoes come in a wide width option
These shoes are very stylish and comfortable. I have plantar fasciitis and this supports my heel greatly. I feel like I'm walking on a marshmallow.

These are lightweight, comfortable and affordable. I walk in them and run sometimes, though I wouldn’t say they are supportive enough for serious running and I can feel my feet rolling inward with the pressure on the arch support (I am flat footed).I have already worn the tread completely off on parts of this shoe after only 3 months of occasional wear. Parts of the sole are also coming unglued. I don’t wear these very often and I’ve had adidas that lasted 2yrs before the shoe has worn down. So my advice would be to save up $100 extra dollars and buy a pricier pair, because you definitely get what you pay for.

title: adidas Men's Kaptir 3.0 Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable and well-made, with a roomy fit that accommodates wide feet. They appreciate the look, value for money, and lightweight design. The durability receives mixed feedback - while some find them durable, others report they fall apart before wearing out. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding them too small.

Review.review: These are my comfy shoes. I actually bought my son a pair of red and grey for school and fell in love with the quality and the design. Of course...I had to figure out how to convert from men to women but it was worth the extra effort. They fit me snuggly yet not to th point where I feel uncomfortable. These shoes are lightweight yet so comfortable that I absolutely plan to get a few others to mix up my styling. The laces are great at staying put...no need for double tying. They are easy to put on and Sweetie pie....you'll be in heaven because you will forget you even have them on.  I've received a few compliments from strangers about them. I am in love with a pair of shoes.... well worthy of every penny spent.

I recently bought the Adidas Wonder Beige sneakers, and I couldn’t be happier! They look even better in person—the color is stylish and goes well with almost anything. Super lightweight and breathable, perfect for everyday wear or casual outings. The fit is comfortable right out of the box, and the cushioning makes them easy to wear all day. Great value for the price too. Highly recommend if you’re looking for a versatile and modern pair of sneakers!
Excellent shoes, the fit is perfect and the materials are quality. Looks great with jeans, shorts or joggers. Super comfortable and grippy. Adidas Rock 🤘🏼
It's very lightweight & comfortable! The fit is great as I usually wear 9.5 (W) I bought a 9 (M) for my comfort. The laces untie while exercising, but overall good for the price that I paid!

Comfortable, lightweight, and breathable. These are great shoes that fit snug against your feet making them great for all around activities. My only gripe is the design change. I had planned on buying these again because the inside of mine have gotten a little worn due to my activities but I noticed that the design changed a little (from three stripes on the side to adidas being spelled out)—personally I prefer the design on my current pair to the current design.

Found these during Prone Deal Days at a great price and they had my size in Wide. I was skeptical on the type fabric that was used since it was different from what I was accustomed too. They turned out great! Very comfortable for my wide Flinstone feet. They have great support and because of the design of the laces they stretch for comfort but are also tight enough so I do not feel that the heel is slipping up and foe. I’m pretty rough on my athletic shoes and I’m looking forward to seeing if they are tough enough to last over 6 months without tearing overall I like the texture, color and most of all they are comfortable. I wish I had purchased 2 pairs or looked for another color in wide.

Fits true to size. The design makes for slip resistant grip and excellent quality for walks in all seasons. The material is thin enough for breathability while still offering support. These shoes function as date night and workout options.

*Cons about the buying experience (not the shoes themselves)-  I was excited to find these shoes for my husband, highly discounted; but did not realize I was buying shoes that were already worn before. I’ve shared photos of what they looked like, immediately after opening the package from Amazon- just not happy about the fact that I thought I was buying BRAND NEW shoes, which these were obviously not! Since he needed the shoes now, I decided to not return them, but just wanted to leave this review to let others know what I experienced. Yes, the price was a great deal and the shoes are comfortable and no tread is noticeably gone, but the dog shit on the bottom and a big spot on the top of one shoe…is just unacceptable. I have purchased things that were used before and have no problem with that, but after double checking myself, I realized that was not the case this time, with these shoes.*Pros- These Adidas are the second pair I’ve bought, for the ease of slip-on feature and the option to purchase in a wide width…super convenient and very comfortable! The bottoms feel like they’d be slippery, but my husband says they’re really not. The insoles are not as soft as his other pair (different style), but he says they feel like they’ll be more durable!So I’d definitely leave a 5 star review for the shoes themselves, but 3-star was given simply because they were not new, as described.

title: adidas Men's Ultradream DNA Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable, well-fitting, and good value for money, with one customer noting the wider toe box and another mentioning the flexible fit around the foot. The shoes receive positive feedback for their appearance and lightweight design, and customers appreciate their quality as walking shoes. The support and durability aspects receive mixed reviews - while some customers find them excellent, others report issues with holes developing in the shoes.

Review.review: Very comfortable, better stability than ultraboost but still has good padding. Toe box is wider than normal shoes which is very nice. Good quality and appears as expected. This is my second pair. Fits my insoles for plantar fascitis very well which is the biggest plus for me
These shoes fit perfectly, are incredibly lightweight and airy.  On top of being incredibly comfortable these shoes have a great appearance.
Lightweight and comfortable.

Soft fabric, but very comfortable to wear.  I find my feet moving inside the sneaker more than I would like due to the soft fabric that wraps around the feet.  The overall quality of the shoes is good, as one would expect from Adidas.  Since the shoe is made from soft fabric, and the color is black and gray, the cleaning should be minimal and should be easy.  Given the material that the shoe is made with, the shoe is relatively breathable and not trap heat from my feet like many all leather shoes tend to do.  The shoes feels light in weight and is a perfect pair of walking shoes.
Great quality. Super comfortable. Seem to have pretty good arch support so far. They are very breathable and just over all I would give these a thumbs up.
Adidas tend to fit me better than the other brands. This shoe is surprisingly good for the price. Good cushion, comfortable, nice look.

I always struggle to find shoes that I like so when I do I buy several pairs of the same shoes. I now have a couple of pairs of these shoes. The quality is pretty typical for Adidas. Decent but not exceptional. But I am not really willing to pay $150 or $200 for shoes so decent is just fine with me. I will mention with these shoes they fit really well but the toe area is made of a stretchy material and almost feels like a sock/shoe hybrid. I was concerned they wouldn't be durable because of this but they are my daily shoes and they have no signs of early wear. The hybrid feel took a few days to get used to but now I actually really like the feel. I wouldn't plan on going out and playing soccer or rock climbing in these shoes but they're great as daily commuters.
Very light shoe. It's a sneaker so not really for jogging nor light off- pavement. Not a bad walking shoe.

title: adidas Men's Duramo Speed 2 Running Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes to be of good quality, comfortable, and well-fitting, with excellent support and good traction for walking. They consider them a great value. The cushioning receives mixed feedback, with one customer describing it as very cushy while another finds the sole too soft. The shoe structure also gets mixed reviews, with one customer noting the tongue tends to fold in.

Review.review: Excellent quality
Very impressed with the quality of this shoe. Better running support then my Ascis. I like these so much I bought another pair.

Comfortable for running ( indoor) and styling in florescent yellow, these are my daily gym runners and I have been very pleased with them. They are wide enough to allow your feet to breath and there is good toe room to protect against damage to the toes and their nails.
Seem good I usually go with asics they last longer and are comfortable lets hope theses don’t rip right out like my last pair of adidas and underarmour shoes
Very nice shoe for the money. Excellent support. I’m on my feet all day and these are as supportive as my brooks.
I have a lot of Adidas items in my wardrobe from shoes, to shirt to jackets and I have never had reason to complain about them and these shoes are no exception. Very comfortable and look great!

They feel good, but ive worn them 3 times for running and already showing lots of wear and tear in the foam sole. Terrible quality. These shoes seem to have a half life of only a month. Considering most Americans weigh more than any other country on the planet, you think they would take that into consideration when making a sports shoe. Probably alright if you weigh about 170 but anything above that... well the foam doesnt have enough density to compensate for the increase pressure of those impacts. And to charge 90 bucks retail for this really shows the degradation of Adidas and the cutting corners they have been taken. Proof is in the pudding.
Excelente producto

title: adidas Men's Racer TR23 Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable, lightweight, and true to size. They are ideal for exercising and everyday wear, with one customer noting they lasted through an entire school year. Customers appreciate their good looks and consider them great value for money.

Review.review: These are comfortable shoes. This is the 3rd pair of the TR series, and they all fit well and appropriately for the size. I am a HS principal and wear these on game day because they provide enough support to walk/stand in all day. I am happy with how Adidas shoes fit and their quality.
Shoes came in quick! They feel great on long walks and were the right size!

These Adidas Racers are my son’s favorite shoes—this is actually his second pair! He loves that there are no laces to tie, making them super easy to slip on, especially for gym class. They're extremely comfortable and have held up well with regular use. He’s a big fan of the sleek style, and they go great with everything. Definitely a solid buy if you're looking for a hassle-free, stylish, and comfortable shoe.

This is a great shoe, arrived one time, lightweight, but solid.  Fits true to size.  The slip resistance is a little low, however.  I wish that the tread was deeper.  The photo doesn't show laces, but it is a laced shoe (vs slip on).  Comfortable.

Loving these shoes. Comfortable fit and fit to size . Very comfortable for walking or running as well. Want a shoes for the gym then check these out as well , very stylish and can wear with anything you choose . Very good material
I love them, the way they fit and look.
These are THEE most comfortable sneakers I’ve owned. Definitely getting another pair
Very comfortable!!

title: adidas Men's Lite Racer 3.0 Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, well-fitting, and attractive, with good value for money and a lightweight design. They receive positive feedback for their appearance and durability, though some report them falling apart after two months of wear. The material quality receives mixed reviews, with one customer noting poor inner sole material.

Review.review: Bought these for my son, and they fit like a charm! They're super lightweight, comfortable, and have held up great through school days. Very happy with the purchase!
Great casual black shoe. They fit well, true to size. They are super comfortable,  even when my husband is on his feet all day!
Las tallas son perfectas. En mi caso siempre compro 9 y horman perfecto. Muy cómodos.

Pros: I’ve been very happy with Adidas shoes in the past, and these are no exception: great shoes! I thought I’d ordered black, but the shoes that came were actually a dark blue. For me, this was a positive because the blue is a surprisingly nice look. They feel sturdy, support my foot in all the right places, fit near perfectly, and are very comfortable to wear. Another plus for me is that they shed my dog’s fur. We have a Lab that sheds like she just left the North Pole for the Sahara desert, so this was a huge and pleasant surprise. Finally, the cost of these is astoundingly inexpensive. I’ve paid twice the price for shoes that weren’t this comfortable.Cons: so far the only con I’ve found is that the material of the soles tend to grab my socks as I’m putting on the shoes. It takes a bit of doing to put on the shoes without having part of my sock pulled and folded underneath my foot. Normally this would be a big deal for me, but the shoes are so nice otherwise that it’s simply not a big deal.Unknown: longevity. The pair of Adidas that this pair is replacing is 3 years old without any real issues other than I wore the soles through. Time will tell if these will hold up in a similar manor.
Excelente  calidad .. el producto 100% original y llego como se había pedido
Love these shoes

The shoe is lightweight and comfortable. BUT the inner sole made of 'recycled' materials breaks down quite fast. It's just a few months and wearing the shoe for roughly 6 hrs per week, and the inner sole has started breaking and crumbling. It's like a thick papery material so what can you expect.

I was skeptical in buying shoes. I usually never buy shoes or apparel online but I took a chance and it turned out great. The shoes fit perfectly. The only thing wrong is the laces are a little long. But other than that, great pair of shoes.

title: adidas Men's Run Falcon 3.0 Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, with one noting they don't hurt their feet, and appreciate their quality and appearance. The shoes are versatile, working well for walking, gym use, and running, and are praised for their lightweight design and cushioning. Customers consider them good value for money and like their fit, with one mentioning they accommodate wide feet well.

Review.review: Fit runs a little large but a comfortable shoe. Well constructed, as one would expect from Adidas.
For the price these shoes are ultra comfortable.  No complaints on my end...

Purchased this pair of Adidas Men's Run Falcon 3.0 shoes for everyday use and I have been extremely impressed with their lightweight comfort.  They are not as narrow in fit as many of the shoes out there.  They have a nice width across the metatarsals for someone needing a slightly wider fit.  The tongue fits well in the shoe with no uncomfortable rubbing.  I have a very high instep and find some shoes are difficult to get on and become very tight across the top of my foot, no problem with that with this shoe's fit. The heel is a good height with a secure fit and has not caused any tenderness in that area.  These shoes are an excellent lightweight, nice looking, and comfortable everyday shoe.  In fact, I have enjoyed them so much that I have bought a second pair.  Highly recommended.
Excellent product. Size about the fit
Have used it for a year. Super comfortable and has good grip. I even used it for few hikes in the pacific north west (which is slippery and muddy).
I bought these for my husband and he’s absolutely obsessed with how comfortable and cute they are. I got them for an Eurotrip we’re about to have!!!
Comfort,  Comfort,  Comfort at a great price

Very Good, it fits well, and it tend to get dirty easily especially when you running on the breakdown lane or trails and is hard to clean. Haven’t slipped once and these allowed me to run a 5k without shin splints. Overall im glad i bought these for 40$.

title: adidas Men's Kaptir 4.0 Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these walking shoes comfortable and lightweight, with a great look and decent price. They appreciate the quality, with one customer noting they're perfect for all-day wear. The fit receives mixed feedback, with several customers mentioning they run narrow for wide feet.

Review.review: Was apprehensive about ordering these. I usually order the kaptir 1 or 2 and I ordered the 3 a few months ago. They were much narrower and the sizing was off in comparisons to the 1 and 2. Brooks running shoes started to give me a pain on top of my foot. Similar to a stress fracture. So got the 3 kaptir in the closet and ran and pain went away. I like a roomy toe box when running and these 3 are not that in comparison to 1 and 2. So I ordered half a size bigger in the kaptir 3 and then also ordered my normal size in the kaptir 4 and I’m very happy with the fit the comfort and the roomy toe box. Would say so far better than the 2. Haven’t ran with them yet but will. Overall this is a great shoe. Never again will I waste money on brooks. The bad thing is a shoe might feel good when you try them on in the store and then once you run in them and spend time on your feet in them then you find out whether the shoe is great, good or horrible. I do treadmill running and the best success I’ve had with brands is adidas kaptir. New balance several pairs have been horrible, Pegasus 39 have been horrible for running but great walking shoe, numerous other adidas, one time a puma. So far adidas surpasses brooks, Nike, puma, new balance for running.
Nice shoes easy to take off and put on
Comfortable and good quality!

These are my favorite shoes, looks good and super comfortable with a strong sole, the only issue with these is I ordered the black and green ones but they are actually just green, maybe the photos or wrong or I got the wrong shoe. Still keeping them since I like green
Takes a minute  for the shoe to fit good but after breaking them in they are so comfortable I stand a lot and these have great support

I love these Adidas. The fit is as expected.  Love the Grey color.I wear between size 9.5 - 10Read a bunch of reviews and it was mentioned they run a little big so I ordered a Size: 9.5 and they are PERFECT.  Not too tight and I have a leeeeetle bit of space so my TOEZ can breathe.
Very uncomfortable and narrow for a wide!
Very comfortable

title: adidas Men's X_PLR Path Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, well-made, and lightweight, with one noting they don't look oversized on their feet. They appreciate the great appearance and consider them good value for money. The size receives mixed feedback, with some finding them perfect while others say they run small. Durability is also mixed, with some finding them durable while others report the fabric ripping.

Review.review: Very comfortable and stylish shoes. This is my first pair of the X PRL Path sneakers but I am very happy with the quality and fit.The cloud foam is very soft and comfortable on your feet when walking and standing. They are very light weight, durable and slip resistant. They do seem to be more narrow than my other shoes but thankfully they still fit me perfectly. I wear size 11 and they do fit to size length wise.I purchased these shoes in Black/Lucid Lemon and I absolutely love the bold Yellow color. It's even brighter than in the pictures. They definitely stand out! I have a lot of Adidas shoes but this is my first of this color, and they go perfectly with my Adidas Tiro 3 stripe black/lucid lemon shirt!The price was also a great value for Adidas brand shoes. I have only worn them a few times, so will update if anything changes, but so far I am very satisfied and have already recieved a compliment on them!

I gave these sneakers as a birthday present, and they were a total hit. As soon as my partner opened the box, their face lit up — they loved the style, and it was exactly the vibe I was going for: clean, modern, and easy to wear with pretty much anything.They put them on right away and said they were super comfortable. The fit was just right, and they felt sturdy without being too bulky. Breathable, supportive — basically, everything you'd want in a sneaker.

I bought these for my son because he has several adidas outfits and he needed something comfortable.  So, we kill 2 birds with one stone.  There's no complaints from him and he wears them often.  These are great for semi wide feet and causes no blisters, but he does wear socks with them.  It is a nice, clean and versatile shoe.

I’ve worn a lot of different adidas sneakers over the years, and these X_PLR Paths are a really solid option if you’re looking for something casual and lightweight. They’re comfortable right out of the box — no break-in time needed — and the Cloudfoam cushioning does a good job for everyday walking and running errands.The color looks great in person — just a little more muted than it appeared online, which honestly I liked even better once I saw them. They’re really easy to pair with jeans or joggers.One heads-up: they’re more of a casual/lifestyle shoe than a hardcore running shoe. Fine for light workouts, but if you’re planning serious running, you might want something a little more performance-focused.Overall, really comfortable and clean-looking for everyday wear.

Size 12 fits great. No tie all toggle to loosen or pull tight. So far they are super comfortable. Great color and style also. 10/10 I'm going to order more in other colors. High five Amazon! Way to go
Great value. Great comfort and fit.

These Adidas X_PLRs are my go-to running shoes—this is my third pair, and I won’t wear anything else. They feel amazing every time I run. The comfort and arc support are exactly what I need, and they really help relieve stress during my workouts. Lightweight, supportive, and stylish—perfect in every way. Highly recommended for anyone serious about comfort and performance.
The shoe fits true to size, quite possibly the most comfortable golf shoe I have ever worn. Also very lightweight. Considering buying another pair in different color.

title: adidas Men's Lightblaze Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable and of great quality.

Review.review: Great fit, Great comfort, 10 out of 10 😉.
Great shoes! Very comfortable! These are fast becoming husband's favorite.
Very comfortable shoes
Great shoe...runs almost a half size big. Which is perfect...if your second toe is longer than your big toe!😆

This is one of my favorite shoe purchases. The shoes are very comfortable on my feet. I stand all day at work and these really provide a soft cushion for my feet. I am very pleased with these running shoes. Definitely looking to get another color.
Love the shoes!
Great pair of sneakers to wear on a daily basis. OK for slow jogs perfect for walking. Not suitable for intense running. Plus, it looks super jazzy in my opinion.

title: adidas Women's Response Super Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes durable and perfect for running. They are comfortable, with one customer noting their good quality.

Review.review: Excelente producto
Best shoes, for a 10hrs shift 🫶🏼
Fits perfect to my size. Very comfortable.
Igual a la imagen pero esperaba un poco más de calidad
Muy buen producto recomendado 100%
Really like these shoes! Perfect tu to run
Divinos, cómodos o
Muy buen zapato

title: adidas Womens X_PLR Path
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable, well-made, and perfect for everyday wear, with good cushioning and support for walking. The style receives positive feedback, and customers consider them good value for money. Regarding size, while some customers say they fit true to size, others report they run a little large.

Review.review: Great shoes. The fit and durability are great. They are comfortable and feel nice on my feet. My son also likes to wear them and they go with everything.

I bought these sneakers for work. I work in a hospital and I’m on my feet a lot, they match everything because they’re white. They are very durable and the quality is nice and lightweight. I have a little bit of a wider foot and they fit nice and my feet have never hurt in them. They offer good support and wearability. I’m really happy with them.

I don’t normally buy myself white shoes. But these are just so beautiful and chic. They are also the comfiest shoes I’ve ever owned. They are lightweight have the best support and are super durable the best quality shoes I’ve had in a long time. I have walked around Disneyland, Universal Studios, and also went on many hikes in these. They are super easy to clean as well.

These are great sneakers! The memory foam sole is comfortable, but it also offers little support. The dance team I coach uses these for our team sneakers. Many have boat insoles for the shoes. To offer some extra support.They do fit a little bit big, so we tell our dancers to order a .5 size down. After discovering that, we’ve had no dancers with issues of the shoes fitting correctly.

These shoes are amazing! I've been wearing them every single day for several months, and they still look brand new, which speaks volumes about their quality. They are incredibly flexible and comfortable, and the material is a breeze to wipe clean. I highly recommend these for everyday wear!
Absolutely love these shoes. They fit so good and I love the fabric. Very comfortable. Especially for being brand new.
Love these shoes. I purchased them at the last minute before going on our European vacation and so glad I did. I wore them each day and they were very comfortable and look nice as well.
Good quality, bit likely on the cool front, but comfortable

title: adidas Men's Run 72 Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable, stylish with retro looks, and appreciate their perfect fit and lightweight design. However, the shoe quality receives mixed feedback, with some describing them as high quality while others find them poor. Moreover, several customers note that the size runs small and the shoes are noisy. Additionally, the material quality receives negative feedback, with one customer describing it as cheap.

Review.review: Great shoes. Comfy and cute.

Bought these recently for a trip to Orlando figured I was going to be on my feet a lot. Couldn't be happier they are super light and comfortable that cloud foam definitely takes a lot of the pressure off of your legs. While I love my Air Max 90s these for a quarter of the price where worn 90% of the time walking around on my trip because they were so comfortable in that saying a lot seeing as the Air Max 90 is one of the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned so I would say these are full five Stars based on price their ability and comfort plus they look kind of retro love them!!!!!
Fit & much much comfortable

Adidas pulled of a blend of classic vibes on top with modern comfort in the soles. I simply wish Adidas made ‘wide’ options. The shoes feel great for a few hours before the narrow fit begins to make your dogs sore, if you have wide feet. They’re lightweight, and the quality is what one would expect from a company like Adidas.
Shoes are definately half size too small. The don’t have the Adidas logo on them. Kind of wonder if they are really Adidas. Would not recommend.

I love love love these shoes.  They are so comfortable and look great with jeans.  The price is affordable and they are super cute.  This is the second pair I've bought and will continue to buy them.  I just throw mine in the wash when they get a little dirty and they come out perfect.

Compré los Adidas Run 72 para hombre en Amazon y no podrían haber superado mis expectativas. Estos tenis combinan un diseño retro inspirado en los años 70 con un toque moderno que los hace perfectos para uso casual. El color blanco con negro que elegí es elegante y versátil, ideal para combinar con jeans o ropa deportiva.Comodidad: La amortiguación Cloudfoam es un gran punto a favor; se sienten ligeros y cómodos desde el primer uso, como si caminaras sobre una nube. La plantilla de espuma con memoria ofrece un soporte excelente, especialmente para estar de pie o caminar durante varias horas. La parte superior de malla y cuero sintético es transpirable, manteniendo mis pies frescos incluso en días calurosos.Calidad: Los materiales, aunque no son premium, son duraderos y bien ensamblados. La suela de goma ofrece buen agarre en superficies urbanas, aunque puede ser un poco resbaladiza en suelos mojados. Los detalles de gamuza y las icónicas tres rayas le dan un look auténtico y robusto. Llevo usándolos varias semanas y siguen como nuevos.Talla y ajuste: Pedí mi talla habitual (US 9.5 ) y me quedaron perfectos, aunque algunos comentarios mencionan que pueden sentirse un poco grandes. Recomiendo medir bien tus pies o consultar la guía de tallas de Amazon para mayor seguridad. El ajuste es cómodo, pero si usas plantillas ortopédicas, considera pedir media talla más.Precio y envío: Los conseguí en oferta. La relación calidad-precio es imbatible para unos Adidas originales.Conclusión: Los Adidas Run 72 son una gran elección si buscas unos tenis con estilo retro, cómodos y asequibles. Perfectos para el uso diario, caminatas ligeras o simplemente para lucir bien. ¡Los recomiendo totalmente y probablemente compraré otro par en un color diferente!
Comfortable

title: adidas Men's Run 84 Shoes Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable, with one mentioning the Cloudfoam comfort padding, and appreciate their good looks and value for money. The shoes receive positive feedback for their quality and feel, with customers loving the color. Regarding sizing, while some find them true to size, others report they run a bit small.

Review.review: These Adidas shoes are fantastic! They are comfortable, stylish, and perfect for everyday wear or workouts. The quality is excellent, and they fit true to size. I’ve gotten so many compliments while wearing them — definitely worth it. Highly recommend for anyone looking for both comfort and performance!

Most comfortable shoe I’ve owned. As a member of the wide foot population I have a hard time finding shoes able to hold these Fred Flintstone feet. The natural width of these shoes combined with the thick insole make these an amazing option. They look great, last forever, and are insanely comfortable.
Comfortable and fit to size.
Very comfortable!!! Nice color good value. Light weight.
They look great but they run smaller than what I usually wear. My foot is 10 1/2 but I always get 11 because I don't like tight shoes. I couldn't even get my foot in these.
Nice shoe

I recently got my hands on a pair of these Adidas shoes, and let me tell you, it’s like having little clouds strapped to my feet. Seriously, if you've ever wondered what walking on clouds feels like, this is it—Cloudfoam comfort padding for the win. They’re super lightweight too, which is great because who wants to feel like they’re lugging around bricks?Now, let’s talk about the plot twist. These shoes run a size too small. I ordered my usual size, and it felt like my toes were at a clown car convention. So, I had to send them back and get a size up. In ten years of buying Adidas, this was a first—like finding out your favorite coffee shop suddenly sells 5 dollar-foot longs. Not a deal-breaker, just a quirky surprise.Other than that, they’re stylish and true to the photos. No Photoshop magic here, folks. All in all, these shoes are comfy, look great, and live up to the Adidas name. Just make sure to size up, and you’ll be walking on sunshine—or clouds.
The shoe is comfortable, but heel seems a little larger than normal.  Like the Cloud Foam better but getting use to these.

Review.review: Fits great. Comfy. Quality and appearance is great. Bought another color as well.
They are very comfortable also they are very nice.

Pretty comfortable shoes I like the style and at 40 dollars the value for your money is awesome, these shoes run true to size so order your normal size. Only time will tell how long they last me, I don't like that the soles are glued on, but at 40 bucks I can't complain.
They are light and comfortable.
Great fit grandson love them
Very comfy, will buy anther color soon

title: adidas Men's Supernova Ease Running Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these running sneakers comfortable. However, the size receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting they run narrow.

Review.review: At this point in my life. I'm all about comfort. I own many high end Adidas shoes Ultra boost, EVO SL 3 etc.  While not the plushes stack, these are extremely comfortable.  I can wear them all day with no issues.  They fit true to size in my opinion.  They are well made, and the fabric is cometable.  The breathability allows my feet to stay cool on long walk days.  If you have a chance to catch these on sale , the value for what you get is unparallel.I love these so much I bought my wife and both of my sons a pair.  They all love the comfort.
Seems like a very well built shoe at this price point. I’m only returning as they seem to feel a bit narrow for the middle of my foot.
very narrow
Very comfy. The soles feel like clouds when I'm walking. They hold up great. This was the only shoe I could find in my size (size 16 mens).
Es un buen calzado te brinda una estabilidad increíble

If you paid $25 for this shoe maybe you could live with it but something is just not quite right here.  The shoes feel and appear as some knock off version but they are not.  They do not fit like all my other adidas supernova style shoes. I find the tongue of the shoe badly designed and the side lacing support lacking.  Something is off for an Adidas shoe.  Perhaps why they are heavily discounted…
Even better, in the hand. Great looking trainer. Supee support. Definitely on the grey side of black and slim.

Review.review: I absolutely love these sneakers! The color is great, and they’re super comfortable. I’ve used them for my daily walks, hiking, and even took them on vacation to Puerto Rico—they held up perfectly. I sometimes jog in them too, and they still feel supportive and comfortable. A versatile pair of shoes that work well for just about everything. Highly recommend!

Why did you pick this product vs others?:Super good looking shoe from classic well trusted brand. Style is amazing and looks great with anything. Softness, support and cushioning is better than almost anything else at the same price. Plus being able to buy on Amazon payment plan made buying a certainty. A plus

I have been wearing these Adidas for a few months for work and they are comfortable but a little bulky. The insoles had to be replaced in less than a month because the fabric came right off but after replacing them it seems to be fine. They do seem to be good quality and will last probably last awhile.
Im on my feet a day and find trail running shoes to be more comfortable than anything.
Very comfortable, but a very noisy outsole. LOL
Great sturdy and tough shoes for multiple applications. Not the lightest but definitely well constructed.
Nice design, but have a high arch insole. That might be fine for most but if you have even mildly flat feet, these are not comfortable.

In reality, the color is much lighter than shown in the product description (it's gray, but in reality it's closer to white). The sneakers are soft and comfortable (I always prefer Adidas). The picture shows US size 9. I bought it for my father-in-law. My own foot size is European size 43 and I usually buy Adidas with US size 10. So if you are size 42, you can buy US size 9.

title: adidas Women's Kaptir Flow Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable, lightweight, and appreciate their great arch support. They are particularly suitable for wide feet and come in various colors. While customers find them easy to slip on, some mention issues with the laces staying tied.

Review.review: Just got these today. True to size and easy to put on with the two helping loops. Seem comfy with enough room in the toebox for a medium wight sock. Love the lavender/fig/mauve color. And they were on sale!
Love these shoes!!! Ordered 3 pairs! Great fit, great color, very comfortable!!!

Like Converse Chuckies these are one of the few shoes that work for womens weight lifting. They have the ideal flat bottom anchoring base of support that is comfy and stabilizing  for gym work. The insert is on the thin side. Great for balance.They run true to size using foot length measurements.  And are medium width heel  with a generous toe box. There is room for an insole/orthotic/ arch support without taking out the insole they come with.They offer support but not enough cushioning for running. Better to get options like Adidas  alphabounce or New Balance fresh foam x or good budget high foam runners like  Allswifit.These adidas are very much like a cozy pair of moccasins you love. If you run skip this. If you walk or lift weights you will love it. Good sturdy shoe. Outstanding Adidas craftsmanship. And cute even with dresses.

I’ve been looking at Adidas kaptir’s for a while now and never bought. So glad I did though. They’re similar to my cloudfoams.. light and comfy, easy to slip on. I got my regular size 7.5 and fits perfectly.

These are great walking shoes probably the most comfortable shoes I have had in a while. The colors and the design are nice. The only problem I have is after three months of wearing them delivering for Amazon, The bottoms of them are slick. So definitely can’t wear them when the grass is wet. Great arch support, lightweight. I would say it’s a value for my money but the bottoms.!!!
Love this shoes very comfortable and it fits true to size, it’s a bit hard to slip on, it doesn’t stretch and it’s easy to clean
Comfortable  True to size, very nice colors,  recommended
Great quality also very comfortable

title: adidas Women's Run Falcon 5 Trail Sneaker

Review.review: I have multiple pairs of Adidas shoes. This was the first pair of this style.  I wore them on a recent flight then cruise to Alaska. Lots of walking, especially through large airports. They are very comfortable.  I have a narrow foot, narrow heel, high arch. They fit well. Looked great with different type of outfits. Water resistant.  Well made. The material is a nylon type water resistant fabric. I didn't wear them in water but seams are sealed well, seems like they will hold up very well. Happy with them.

Comfortable shoes and very affordable. Plenty of room in the toe box. I'm on my feet for 8 hours and my feet don't hurt at the end of the day. I wouldn't order these for running,  they're great for walking.

Very happy with the fit of these shoes, and they are very comfortable! Love that they are waterproof which will make them usable for more outdoor activities. I would maybe size down half a size, I have a tiny bit of extra room in the toe box, but that may be purposefully so you can wear thicker socks.
Second pair of this style shoe. Daughter loves them.
Fit great, gave me a heel blister from how high the heel pad comes up. But good shoe good buy
Just as pictured, great quality, fit is normal, and comfortable for my job on my feet all day.
Comfortable fit, nice look
Lindos y cómodas

title: adidas Women's Puremotion Adapt Running Sneakers
Customer_say: Customers find these shoes comfortable, easy to slip on, and appreciate their lightweight design and versatility for various activities, particularly noting they're great for working out and daily wear. The style receives positive feedback for its appearance, and customers like their quality for both work and leisure use. The fit and support receive mixed reviews - while some find them a perfect fit with good arch support, others mention they run wide and have little support in the toe area.

Review.review: These adidas Puremotion Adapt sneakers have been a win for me. Super lightweight, easy slip-on style, and surprisingly supportive for everyday wear. The color combo looks even better in person—clean with just the right pop of orange. They do run a touch snug at first but break in nicely after a couple of wears. Perfect for chasing my toddlers around or casual outings where I want comfort without sacrificing style.

I’ve been wearing these for a week during my everyday light cardio, and I like them! The color is so pretty! But the best part for me is that the bottom is not too soft, so I can actually feel my feet are on a solid surface and keep my balance.I’m usually a 6.5, but according to the size guide, I need to size down, so I ordered a 6 and they fit perfectly.

I was skeptical about how well these sneakers were going to fit. I’m very particular about how sneakers fit me (because I get blisters very easily). When I first put them on, I felt they were a little snug around the sides. I walked around in them when I took my kids for a walk, then took them off for the day. However, the next day, I slipped them on, and BAM, they fit like a glove! For my high arch they provide enough support. Even with no-show socks on, the rim of the shoe has yet to give me blisters. They feel snug enough where if I run I don’t feel like they will come off, but not so snug where they are uncomfortable. I believe they are designed for a more “custom feel”, thus why they may feel snug or tight initially. For my size 7 foot, they fit nicely. I do not run, so I cannot comment on how practical they are as a running shoe. But as a mom of two kids under 5, I can vouch for their comfort as an every day sneaker.

Great shoes. Adidas have always been comfortable and easy on my feet and back. Great for being on your feet a lot. My only problem is both are the same size. But the newer ones fit smaller than the others did when I first bought them. You can tell put in a lot of work on the first pair🤣 As I said, Great shoes for being on your feet a lot and doesn't make my feet and back hurt as much as other shoes. Will definitely be getting more of course. But might size up a little on the next pair. The newer ones are starting to stretch out a little more so they aren't as tight as they were previously but still just a little too tight for my liking.

This shoe is lightweight, comfortable, supportive, and stylish. After being on bedrest and pregnant, my feet hurt all the time. I bought a pair to wear around the house. I loved them so much, I bought a second pair for out and about. They are easy to get on and I love that there are not laces. It doesn't feel like you're wearing some bulky sneaker. They give the right support for my arches and ended up helping my lower back pain. I get tons of compliments. I will definitely be buying more. No more bulky, lace up sneakers for me.
Excellent value. Very stylish and fits as advertised. Wish they came in a thousand colors!

These are very cute and the memory foam type insole feels very comfortable when you first put these on. They feel light weight and supportive. That being said, I bought them to bartend in and even after breaking them in, my feet are SCREAMING by the end of an 8 hour shift. The worst part is I have very expensive custom insoles I planned on putting in them, but the memory foam insole the shoe comes with is sewn in and cannot be removed. When attempting to just place my insole directly on top of it it makes the shoes way too tight. So these are cute but don't buy if you plan on being on your feet all day!
The most comfortable shoes.. I got a lot of women in my family to buy these as well. Definitely more comfortable than my more expensive tennis shoes

title: adidas Men's Supernova Prima Running Shoes

Review.review: Fantastic shoe...I bought these having never worn Adidas running shoes. I did have an Adidas hiking shoe that was indestructible, but eventually wore out. I have been wearing Nike Pegasus for years. The Pegasus fit and feel is great, especially for a narrow foot. Price had become too costly, like most shoes. So after some time watching and reading reviews, I took a gamble on the Supernova Prima. Only a few days in to wearing, I have zero complaints. They feel like plush toys. Mind you, I walk; very little running, no high mileage, etc. just day to day wearing to work and for exercise.They are lightweight, and roomier than the Pegasus in the forefoot. I should also point out that they probably run a half size bigger. I wear a men's 12D. But I'm keeping these - colder months, room for thicker socks. The semi-gusseted tongue is also great; a soft, thin, pillowtop-esque portion of tongue is unique to this shoe. The upper is soft like a jersey feel. I wish the outsole was more like the waffle of a Nike or even had the Adidas Continental rubber, but not a dealbreaker.I put non-custom orthotics in mine. Heel feels cushiony and ball of foot is the same, bounce like.I'll admit the hyper turquoise accent color is awful. And if you go for the most current model, color selection is terrible. Not sure why Adidas would choose chain gang gray/highlighter and light communist gray as the 2 color options instead of anything else, but they did.If I can update review after 3 months, I can speak to durability. Will be walking in these all summer. Feet happy.
Great shoe I am 63 280 pounds and right out of the box. I did a 3 mile jog on the street and the shoe handled like a champ.!!!!

Son muy cómodas aunque las pedí talla 11 porque en otras marcas esa es mi talla y me quedaron un poquito grandes pero bueno al final eso no es motivo para no usarlas les sugeriría pedirlas media talla menos ya que vienen algo más grande
No

Only a tiny bit snug, but not terribly. You might want to consider going half size larger.
These shoes are very comfortable and good for working out as well as regular wear.
Snug as bug.

title: adidas Men's Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable enough to wear all day, with great arch support and good value for money. They are lightweight and versatile, working well for gym workouts and HIIT sessions. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it's true to size, others report they run big.

Review.review: These Adidas sneakers are brutal. They have a modern design that combines sport with a feminine touch thanks to the details in pink, white and orange. They are super comfortable, lightweight and the mesh at the top makes your feet not hot.The padded sole makes walking or exercising much smoother, and as a good Adidas classic, the three stripes on the side cannot be missed. Perfect to wear all day, either for training or just to go out in style.
Very lightweight and comfortable. Design is also fabulous. Gives your feet a good cushion while running and running. Highly recommend even for day to day chores.

This is a great sneaker for long walks.  There’s lots of toe room; I have fat toes (yes, really) and some shoes pinch them, but these don’t, yet they’re tight enough at the heels.  The soles are just right for walking.  I like the pale pink color.
These are a great price and very comfortable. I sit at a desk all day and find them to be very supportive.
True to size. Very comfortable and sturdy
I loved this item. These are shoes I had been looking for for a long time. They look exactly like the picture. They are very comfortable. Definitely a pair of athletic shoes I’m going to wear a lot.
Nice shoes.

This shoe is too narrow for my feet which are admittedly wide, however I've not had problems like this with other shoes. I got blisters, because the insole is also too narrow and has an edge, that rubbed my foot sore. I had to swap the insole with another from an old shoe to make this pair usable. If you have narrow feet, this might not be an issue for you in which case this is a decent pair of shoes for the money.

title: adidas Men's Ultraboost Light Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, great for walking and running, and appreciate their lightweight feel, with one customer noting they're excellent for standing all day at work. The shoes receive positive feedback for their style and quality, though opinions about durability are mixed, with some saying they hold up well while others find them not as durable as expected. Customers disagree on the fit, with some finding them great while others say they're too tight, and while some consider them good value for money, others find them too expensive.

Review.review: These got good reviews in a running magazine and they were spot on. I’m a larger guy but these have a great amount of support. Made well and by far the best running shoes I’ve ever owned.

These shoes are high quality and fit incredible. I love the feel of the cushioning as I walk and run. It helps propel me into the next stride with the utmost confidence. These shoes have a great style and the fit true to size.
Good shoes, kinda ugly heel but they get more comfy as i walk and i prefer them over my old daily runners.
Great shoe, great deal!

The original Ultraboost 1.0 just look far superior to these new revisions. That being said, you can definitely feel the extra lift and comfort these provide. I feel like my strides are light and I get a lot of cushioning. I have walked dozens of miles in a day with these and enjoyed myself at concerts and shows too with no foot ache or cramp to speak of afterwards. Just wish they looked a bit more sleek like the original run, but you get the benefit of comfort and performance for a great daily walker and they're priced well enough you can beat on it without feeling bad. I'd likely pickup another pair just to rotate designs and keep them both looking a bit less beat up overtime. If you are looking for ideal running shoes, these are not bad but you are probably better served with something for even more high-impact that doesn't completely "deaden" the floor underneath you with the cushioning while still providing good return for energy spent. In other words, these are light, but not light enough for performance running, but in the excellent sweet spot for daily wear and even easy jogging, basketball, and light sports or long hikes on even terrain (I would recommend more proper trail shoes with better grip for more imbalanced terrain).

Estas zapatillas las he utilizado y me han parecido muy cómodas, se adaptan perfectamente a mi pie. Una de las cosas que me ha gustado mucho ha sido su peso el cual se siente más ligero.Anteriormente notaba que después del entreno de 10k o 15k, la planta de mis pies quedaban adolorida; Ahora con las ultraboost esa molestia ha desaparecido.Para mis jornadas diarias de 10km son perfectas, cómodas y una excelente amortiguación lo cual se refleja en confort.Un aspecto a tener en cuenta, es que la zapatilla es bastante ajustada, debes considerar si tu pie tiene un empeine alto y si la planta del pie es ancho; te recomendaría una talla superior a tu  talla normal.  De resto es una zapatilla Súper recomendada.
Excelente

Additional: 05/13/24... The shoe is very comfortable and now after several days of walking I very much like the shoe, cept for the difficulty putting it on.The shoe is light, has a great sole for balance, although I do find it a bit hot and I suggest it better if the front area of the foot were vented mesh. The actual small area on the top does not really vent the heat from my feet adequately.At this point, 2 days after receipt, the only issue I see is the shoe is without question the most difficult to put on shoe I have ever owned.There are no finger loops on the heel nor tongue.Without finger loops you are forced to awkwardly spear the front of your foot into the shoe and employ either you fingers (sucks) or in my case a long handled shoe horn to slide your foot into the shoe.More to come as further investigation is allowed.
