They are easy to put on and take off, with a good fit for wide feet, and one customer mentions there's plenty of room for insoles. The BOA lace system receives positive feedback, and customers appreciate the easy tightening and loosening mechanism. The shoes provide impressive traction, with one customer noting the tough rubber sole still has tread.

Review.review: Great hiking shoes! Stood the test after 2 weeks hiking in the rockies and Big Sur. Comfortable, according to my 7 year old, great traction, and easy on/off.

I bought the New Balance Dynasoft Trail Magic V1 running shoes for my five-year-old, and they’ve been fantastic. The design makes it super easy for him to put them on and tighten them up by himself—great for building independence. The traction is impressive, making them ideal for hikes and outdoor play. They hold up well on different terrains, and my son says they’re really comfortable. Best of all, he absolutely loves wearing them. Highly recommend for any active kid who loves to explore!

Bought these for my daughter who has wide feet and these are great. She’s too young to tie her own shoes, but the BOA lace system works perfectly for her (and is guaranteed for life through BOA if it ever breaks). They’re well made with great traction. She’s tough on shoes and these have held up well plus they give her independence with her shoes.

These are perfect for younger kids who havent mastered lace tying, so easy to use and great when you have multiple kids you dont want to redo the laces on the trails all the time. My daughter loves them, theyre comfortable and fit well and are very light weight. If i let her, she would wear them every day.

My grandson loves these shoes. They have held up to his 13 year old wear and tear. They are great shoes, very durable!!! And extremely easy to use and best comfort ever! Would definitely buy this product again.

We love these shoes! They’re breathable, stylish, comfortable, well made, and no laces to tie. The fit is good for my child’s wide foot. On Amazon the pricing is all over the place, so the value for money comes and goes.
My son loved these shoes and wore them for a year. I wish they made them in men’s sizing so I could get him the next size up.

My son is on his sixth pair of these shoes over the course of three years. He wears them into the ground through sports, hiking, and everyday reckless play. I never write reviews but I do believe that these shoes, while much pricier than other brands, are so good for heavily active kids.  We did a trekking trip through Patagonia and he wore these for fifty miles in a few days (versus the Salomon boots that we had brought him).  His feet never hurt. He then continued to wear them for a few more months to school, basketball games, and yard time. So while I begrudgingly paid the $70 this week for a new paid, I reminded myself of all of the excessive use that these shoes endured. Definitely worth it.

title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam 510 V6 Trail Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, well-made, and appreciate their good arch support and nice colors. The fit and size receive mixed feedback - while some say they run true to size, others find them very narrow. Customers disagree on the feel, with some describing them as soft and squishy while others find them hard. Durability is also mixed, with some saying they hold up well while others report them falling apart.

Review.review: I recently bought the Women's 510 Running Shoe from New Balance, and I couldn't be more pleased with my choice. During my runs, these shoes have provided me with more support and comfort than I had anticipated.The midsole's cushioning is excellent, delivering a responsive feel that deflects impact without being overly soft. My knees have occasionally been sore, but ever since I started wearing these shoes, I've noticed a noticeable change in how they feel after my runs.Even on slippery or uneven conditions, the outsole maintains outstanding traction. With every step, I feel secure and solid, which frees me from anxiety about slipping or sliding and lets me concentrate on my run.These sneakers' breathability is just another fantastic quality. Even during extended runs or in warm weather, the upper mesh material keeps my feet cool and dry. No more uncomfortable and hot feet!In terms of sizing, I discovered that these shoes fit true to size and offer a secure and supportive fit without being oppressive. The design is fashionable and I value the range of color choices that let me select a pair that goes with my running gear.
New Balance is my favorite sneaker.  This is well made but a little wide.  I bought my usual size but they seem a little wider than usual.

The New Balance Women's Fresh Foam 510 V6 Trail Running Shoe are very nice and very comfortable.  I prefer a wide toe box.  I bought these in a wide size and they are wide enough for me to spread my toes.  If you like a really soft squishy shoe with a lot of arch support, these are great.  For me they were too squishy and archy and it made my feet work harder to walk in, which was bothersome.  The good part is the insoles can be removed.  Once I removed the insoles they were much more comfortable for me.
Great price. Very comfortable.

I have been buying New Balance Shoes for the better part of two decades.  They were my go to shoe because they fit my feet and were economical.  This is the second time I have had the exact same problem with these shoes.1.5 months ago, I ordered a similar style shoe only to find that they squeaked.  I did not end up returning them because I felt it would be a hassle.  So I ordered a second pair, this pair.Within a week, they are squeaking as well.  I understand the need to keep costs down, but they are compromising in the wrong areas.  New Balance has now lost a costumer.

I like these shoes very much, except for the insoles.  They fit me like I expected.  I need wide, and New Balance is one of the few brands with wide sizes that actually feel wide.  I have an average arch, and this shoe has the right amount of arch for me.  The shoes are well made and have a nice tread.  I have worn these hiking and camping several times and wear them often for just normal wear.  The shoes are not advertised as waterproof but do seem to be water repellent.  I have not submerged them in water but have worn them in damp conditions, and my feet remained dry.Now for the negative, the insoles.  The insoles are textured. The original packaging indicated the insoles were massaging.  I found the texture mildly annoying from the beginning but livable.  After only 4 months, the insoles became very annoying.  I could feel the texture a lot.  The insoles seemed to become hard.  My feet began to hurt quite a lot.  I was disappointed that I might have to discontinue using the shoes.  I took the simple, flat, thin foam insoles out of another pair of shoes to try in them, and the pain and discomfort immediately stopped.  I'm going to buy a cheap pair of thin foam cushion insoles for this pair of shoes, so I can continue to use them.  The shoes look almost new and show very little wear on the tread. Another problem with the insoles was that they squeaked with every step.  That is no longer a problem with the original insoles removed.

These sneakers are great!! They not only give great support but are very comfortable. They have just enough grip to make you feel secure but not stuck to the road. I love the way they look with multiple outfits, because the accent colors are subtle but bold enough to be beautiful! Definitely a great selection for a running shoe.
Super cómodas y bonita según la foto

title: New Balance Unisex-Child Fresh Foam 625 V1 Hook and Loop

Review.review: my son's uniform school shoes this year. great quality. he says they are "very comfy"
Perfect fit for wider than normal feet.

Bought two pairs of these shoes - one for my older son and  another for my younger son because they were so comfortable. I purchased them in Feb and March and only 2-3 months later, the Velcro straps on all the shoes don’t stick anymore. Both pairs of shoes are practically new, yet unusable now. Poor quality. Do NOT buy.
Great fit. Comfy. Good built qualityUpdate (after 2 months)The Velcro strips are not that good. Now they don’t stick together. I’ve cleaned them regularly.
My kids loves them , very comfortable
Son loves them. Only downside is one of them won’t stay Velcro shut which leads to the shoe falling off while running. Disappointing considering he’s only had them for 4 weeks.
Its light weight and my son loves it for everyday use. Quality is great for the price tag. Its easy on use as well
My grandson loved the shoes. They were wide enough for his feet and very comfortable!

title: New Balance Women's Fresh Foam Garoe Mid V1 Trail Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these trail running shoes comfortable, durable, and well-made, with good ankle support and a stylish design. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some customers reporting a perfect fit while others find them tight across the toes. The waterproof feature also gets mixed reviews, with some customers saying they are waterproof while others disagree.

Review.review: Looooove these!!!! Not only are they cute, but they are super comfortable, kept my feet safe (bumped into multiple rocks while running a 8.5 trail race) and the ankle support… chef kiss!

Just got these midcut trail runners and been walking around the house for awhile.Initially I hesitated to buy because I sometimes have issues with the mid-ankle height. They tend to bother my ankle bone... but not these New Balance. They are comfortable and do not rub or chafe the bone.My other issue was the chunky squared heel/sole. I thought it was going to be obtrusive.  After putting them on and checking them out I think they are rather complimentary and do not stick out at all.The materials used in these hikers are very good.  I sprayed water on the toe area and it beaded and ran right off, so they are waterproof as listed. Gore-tex rocks!! No one likes wet soggy feet while running and hiking around the country!!Arguably the best feature on this shoe is the locking lace hooks. The final top two lace hooks lock the lace in when you snap it in... great feature because you don't have to hold tension when tying the laces!!! My Merrell hiking boots do not have this feature and I am forever trying to hold them tension at the correct point while tying them. It's rather frustrating because it's hard to get them right... they either get tied too loose or too tight. Not so with these. Once you set the correct tension you simply lock the lace it and it gets held right there so you can tie the shoe with ease.I wear an 8.5 M... in every shoe I have ever bought,  so I bought an 8.5 M and in length they fit perfect. My foot is by no means wide but wearing mid-weight socks these kinda hug my foot and the toe box feels a bit restrictive. I much prefer a wider toe box to prevent toe issues and foot fatigue. So my only real complaint is that this may be an issue on long walks, runs or hikes. Also due to the materials used making these, I rather doubt they will stretch any.Overall, I am glad I decided to give these NB a try... they are more comfortable than my Salomon Speedcross 4s which for me are far too stiff in the soles and tire my feet out.I will keep this pair...

These are my favorite sneakers. I get compliments on them all the time but I also like them bc they are super supportive especially if you have weak ankles. New balance has always been a quality shoe and these are no different. They fit like a cross between a trail sneaker and boot so just sturdy enough but not too sturdy that you feel like you’re wearing a hiking boot.
Very comfortable looking very nice and good engagement on trails

My daughter always wears New Balance shoes because they're durable and usually very comfortable.  She loved the look of these.  Unfortunately, the shoe is too shallow, creating pressure on top of the foot.  This hasn't been the case for other New Balance sneakers.  We were sad to have to return them, as they look very nice.
Excelent
Nice hiking boot. Looked well made. Support felt good but size was way off. I have a wide foot and usually wear an 8.5 but even the 9 was a bit short

I had been looking for a sneaker boot that would be appropriate for walking my large dog through off the beaten path parts of our local parks. I'm prone to stumbling and foot pain so the shoe needed to offer comfort and stability. I say this shoe does exactly as I need it to. It's comfortable and my footing is secure. The padding around the ankle helps stabilize my ankles while not being so thick and stiff as to be uncomfortable. I will say that some comments made mention of the shoe running slightly small. I think it's the width. I purchased my normal size 8 but got the wide version and it's perfect. I can wear thick socks if needed but don't feel like it's squeezing my toes. For me these are working out great and I would recommend them.

title: New Balance Men's 574 Core Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable, well-made, and appreciate their style, with one noting they look newer for longer. The shoes are versatile for both gym and casual wear, and customers consider them excellent value for money. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding them true to size while others say they're too narrow in the front. Durability is also mixed, with some saying they last over a year while others report the suede tearing after less than six months. The color receives mixed reviews.

Review.review: I purchased these for my son. He really likes them and wears them on most days above his other shoes. Comfortable and look great. Shoe quality is great.
New balances are the best shoes for walking and running even boxing i bought alot of different colors comfy and classics.

Recently just became a father of two and bought as an outfit but Oml these have changed my life. They are so comfy and hug feet for great support. They fit true to size and are great for the price. I’ll probably buy some in black next!

I’ve been using my New Balance Men's 574 Core for over a year now, and I couldn’t be happier with my choice. These shoes have exceeded my expectations in both comfort and style. The classic design pairs perfectly with almost any outfit, making them versatile enough for both casual outings and daily errands.One of the standout features has been their incredible comfort. I can wear them all day without feeling any foot fatigue, thanks to the excellent cushioning and support. The quality of materials used is also impressive – they have held up beautifully, showing minimal signs of wear even after extensive use.I’ve walked countless miles, and whether it’s on the pavement or trails, these sneakers provide great traction and stability. The breathability is another plus; my feet stay cool and dry, no matter the weather.Overall, if you're looking for a reliable, stylish, and comfortable sneaker, the New Balance 574 Core is the way to go. I highly recommend it to anyone considering a new pair – you won’t regret it!
Comfortable.Fit me well.Nice cushioning.

Great pair of shoes for everyday walking. New balance knows how to make a decent pair of shoes that feel great and look clean. While other brands focus on looks but feel stiff and hurt your feet after few hours lol. I highly recommend this brand for anyone that wants comfort and support.
Perfect & comfy!
I love this exact model of New Balance.  I have been wearing this model for .. I am not sure, 20-years?  I hope it never goes away.

title: New Balance Unisex-Child Fresh Foam Arishi V4 Bungee Lace with Top Strap Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes to be of good quality, comfortable, and easy to put on, with one customer noting the X-Wide width is spot-on perfection. They hold up well over time, are cute, and offer great value for money. Customers like the color options available.

Review.review: I bought these New Balance sneakers for my daughter, and they’ve been perfect for her active days. They fit well, are easy for her to put on by herself, and give great support for  playing outside. The cushioning keeps her comfortable all day, and the shoes have held up nicely with no signs of wear after weeks of use. She loves the fun colors, and I love the quality—definitely a great buy!

These are the prettiest shoes! My daughter loves to wear these so much, every...single...day! The size shoe that she usually wears is 12.5 in big kids(she is 4 yrs old)&has very wide, chunky feet like me. I wanted a pair that she could wear comfortably and have room to grow into, as well. These were perfect fit! The foot entrance of the shoe was very stretchy, wide, and easy for her to insert her foot into. I got her a size 13.5 Ex-wife, since she usually wears size 12 wide in New Balance perfectly. And this style, this size, and this width was an absolutely amazing fit for my daughter! The value for the money was a great deal, the shoes came in it's original box(which was a big plus, since we store her shoes back into their box between seasons)&the shoe is lightweight&not heavy or bulky for her to wear! Perfect spring/summer time tennis shoe!
We bought these thinking they are lace up, but they are not. Our kid really liked the color and fit so we kept them. They have held up really well and don’t give her blisters.

Perfect shoe for my 6yo. I buy these in various colors as they go up in side.  Great fit with extra wide options for optimal comfort. The color and style makes my kid very happy and kids are able to put them on with ease.
Muy lindos, pero creo q las tallas son grandes, mi hijo usa #1,5 y pedí #2 y le quedan  muy grandes. Lo volveré a pedir pero 1 talla menos.

This is the fourth pair of this shoe style I have bought for my little girl. She says they're very comfy, but if I get other shoes she almost always says something hurts her feet. My only issue is that they don't offer a wide variety of colors for girls that aren't super light. They know these are kids shoes, any color close to white is going to get dirty fast. They also don't have a long enough strap to cover the whole velcro thing and when she sits on the carpet at school (she's in kindergarten they play inside for recess sometimes) they stick to the carpet.Anyway, overall it's a good shoe and they're rather durable.
Great shoes, nice fit. Purchased these for a 6 year old, size 13. True to size, room to grow. Will update with durability!
Update. They are cute but 9 days of wear and the toes are peeling

title: New Balance Women's Dynasoft Tektrel V1 Suede Trail Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes incredibly comfortable, cute, and lightweight, with one customer noting they're perfect for both running and long walks. Moreover, the shoes receive positive feedback for their quality, with one customer describing them as great hiking shoes. However, customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding them true to size while others say they run small. Additionally, the fit and foot support receive mixed reviews.

Review.review: I'm thrilled with these New Balance Dynasoft Tektrel V1. From the first wear, they feel super comfortable thanks to the Dynasoft technology, which offers a soft, cushioned ride, perfect for both running and long walks. The lilac and white design is beautiful and modern, and goes great with athletic or casual wear.The traction sole is ideal for uneven terrain, and the suede finish gives them a sophisticated touch that isn't found in all athletic shoes. Plus, they feel lightweight, breathable, and very well made.I would definitely buy them again! If you're looking for comfort without sacrificing style, these shoes are an excellent choice.
Love it! They are so comfy and I can wear it all day daily or go hiking. They are slightly bigger and heavier than my other snacker but super cute and nice quality.
Comfortable and cute! No break in period and great trail shoes for easy to moderate hikes. The purple is the perfect pop of color but also neutral enough to wear outside of hiking

I decided to wear my New Balance sneakers on a recent trip, and so far they've been incredibly comfortable! The fit is great for walking long distances, and I absolutely love the white and purple color combo — stylish and fresh. I’m not sure if they are waterproof but I’m very happy with this purchase!For reference, I am  8.5 shoes size.  These are 8.5 and fit perfectly.
I just wore these for the first time today on a 6 mile hike that included scrambling up some rocks. They were so comfortable! No break-in time. Zero complaints! Great quality.  True to size.

I purchased these shoes and really enjoyed the way they fit.I noticed right away that they seemed somewhat slippery.Decided to dismiss it and wore them to work.I had a terrible fall.They are worse than ice skates.I am not sure what material is used on the base.But by the grace of god, I didn't break my back.I have to return them.They should improve the good fit of that shoe with a vibrant sole
Light weight and fits and very beautiful designSoft and comfortable

Purchased these for my niece for a recent vacation to a National Park. She said they are very comfortable and they are quite cute as well. Excellent purchase! She reported the cushioning in these is spectacular!

title: New Balance Men's Fresh Foam Rcvry V1 Slide Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, stylish, and appreciate their cushioning that's neither too soft nor mushy. The shoes provide good support, with one customer noting they're great for those with back or hip pain, and customers report their feet don't slip while wearing them. While some customers say the shoes are great for wide feet, others find them too tight. The sizing receives mixed feedback, with some customers saying they fit well while others report sizing issues.

Review.review: I wear these slides for doing work around the house, and they're super supportive and comfortable. The cushioning keeps my legs from becoming fatigued, even after I've completed a morning run, but is not overly squishy. I tried Crocs for the same purpose, but Crocs really made my feet hurt.I normally wear women's size 10.5, medium width, in New Balance running shoes, and ordered these in size 9. The fit is just right. Happy I found them!

These are great recovery slides.  I love New Balance for the arch support and cushion.  Be ware, the cream colored seem to not be true to size vs the black. Seems to be a manufacturing issue, I called New Balance, rep could have cared less!  In the cream I had to order a full size down.  I usually wear a W 9.5 and order a M 8.  In the cream color I had to order a W 8.5, M 7 and they fit perfectly!  I wear them everyday, have a pair in black as well.  Had plantar fasciitis and wear these in the house to support my feet.  Good quality, feet don’t slip.  I highly recommend.

First thing I noticed when I put them on is that the hexagon shapes at the heel is very sharp, feels like stepping on needles.  I had to grind away the foam with a dremel. The fit was a little tight, but a few minutes with a hair dryer resulted in a perfect fit.  These do look fantastic and are very comfortable.

- Sandals are cushiony, sinking in just a little to a solid-ish bed but without feeling too pillow soft or mushy. Have Fresh Foam shoes and can confirm the feel is similar.- Textured footbed provides grip for soles of feet so the sandal doesn't slip around. Also provides a slight relaxing massage feel.- Look is slightly bulky but overall pretty stylish, making more of a fashion statement that an IDGAF flip flop or velcro sandal.- Fit is a hit or miss. Width wise, this sandal fits both narrow and wide (2E) feet. However, the height of the upper (clearance from the footbed to the strap) does not correctly fit the proper foot size. Feet two (2) sizes smaller than the stated size cannot fully slide into it because of how restrictively low the upper is. The strap stretches somewhat, but after a few weeks of use it has not "stretched out" and always gives a too-tight-on-top-of-foot feel as if you were wearing a shoe one size too small and pulled the laces unreasonably tight.If you can dig the look and have not-tall feet (sole to top of foot), this recovery slipper will serve you well. For those of us with normal height feet, look elsewhere unless you like an extra snug feel - three stars ***
Most comfortable slides all day wear. Great for those with back or hip pain. Walk 8000 steps in one day with no real discomfort and having hip arthritis. Could replace your shoes.

i purchased these for a week in disney world but i wear them all the time. they are great slippers for casual wearing but also comfortable on long walks. ive even been complimented on them by other slide connoisseurs. dont let the high price scare you off, they are durable and functional.
My son loves these shoes. They fit great and are true to size. They have a good arch support and are perfect for after football practice. Great price too.
I like New Balance products but these were ridiculously uncomfortable and felt like two different sizes. Sent back.

Comfort and durability are also mixed aspects, with some finding them super comfortable while others say they hurt their feet, and several customers report the shoes falling apart after one use.

Review.review: Shoes are very specific to the shape of each person’s foot, so whether these work for you or not may differ from my experience. However, I really love these shoes. The 2E width was perfect for my medium to wide foot. And I tried on several tennis shoes in the past and most tend to run very narrow and long. The width and length of this shoe was consistent with what I normally wear for everyday use which is NB 574. Very comfortable but also stable with great traction for playing tennis.
Great shoe. Fits true to size with just the right amount of cushioning. New Balance makes great shoes.
Love the design but unfortunately wide size it not wide enough.

Nice quality shoes, nice cushioning midsole & toes area. However this model fits narrower around the arc of my husband’s feet compared to the 696 version6 that he previously purchased. Might be better off with the wider size if your feet is on the flatter side. Only 3 stars because the fit was off and had to return them.
Excellent sneakers!
This is the second pair that the nylon eyelet the on one of the shoes tore out. This happened after the return period. Will not buy New Balance again.
Very comfortable shoes. Wide toe box.
Shoe fit OK (12W), but seem to run a little narrow. Great stability & traction on outdoor pickle ball court. I'd definitely buy again.

title: New Balance Kid's FuelCore Reveal V3 Boa Running Shoe

Review.review: We love these shoes! They are very easy to put one and take off and are super comfortable.
Cute, good quality, and comfy

Perfect fit for a kid with wide feet! I love the bright color, and if I can get these at the same sale price ($25) I'll just keep buying them when my kiddo's size goes up. The kid loves the adjusting button thingy and he plays with it so much, I'm not sure how long it will last. But seriously, the fit, the comfort, the quality, the color... are all perfect!
My ASD son loves these!  He can put them on himself and I love that for him.  Great wide shoe and nice looking!  I recommend !!
Absolutely LOVE!!!!!Fit I true t size. Our favorite part is NO TYING!!!!

8 year old boy wears them.  Loves them, we are on third pair due to growth.  These have held up and looked nicer than the Adidas and Under Armor shoes I bought in August that both already have holes in them.  NB seems to hold up the best to a very very active 8 year old.I love how it cranks closed.  So much so I wish they had the same mechanism on adult shoes for me!  It has held up well to daily use on the last 2 pairs, I really figured the string would break but didn’t.  My son loves it and open and closes just to crank them down for fun so it really was tested a LOT so I give that a 10/10 on durability.I give the shoe 10/10 for durability overall as well!  I will continue getting these as they are the best bang for the buck.  The last pair I bought had lasted a year.  It does look worn but no holes and still works well.  His feet just grew out of them.

Great for my daughter who is still mastering tying her shoes and while we can practice that at home, I don’t have to worry about her tripping over shoelaces at school. Quick easy shoe to get on and off. Love the boa system. The only downside I’ve noticed so far is that she’s been wearing them about a month and part of the grip tread on the bottom of the shoe is already coming undone from the sole 😑  I’ll have to see if superglue helps. Too expensive for it to be coming apart already.
My son loves these sneakers!

Review.review: Great Shoes for my daughter! The fit and color were what we were expecting. No complaints!
I usually buy new balance shoes for my kid for the reason they gave a good arch support. I like this pair fit well and very light in weight. They look well made in terms of quality and comfort.

I have a 2 year old that just beat her personal record at the 200 meters and we owe it all to these shoes. According to her, these are her fast shoes and she proved it by mostly running halfway around the track screaming "I'm so FAST!" before sitting down. I know right, impressive for a child of her caliber. Very durable for how hard she runs and the quick release velcro make putting on her own shoes a breeze. Shoot, if we didn't just miss the olympic trials I would have signed her up. I she will just have to keep running "so fast" until the next trials in 4 years.

I bought these shoes in March 2025, hoping they’d last a long time given the price. Unfortunately, by June 2025, the Velcro on the left shoe stopped sticking, making the shoe practically useless. It’s disappointing to see that money doesn’t always guarantee quality. Otherwise, they were comfortable and looked nice, but the durability just wasn’t there.

The shoes fit my school-aged daughter well and they are her daily shoes. That being said, the material is thin and has worn down after 2 months and caused fuzzies on the tops and sides. We don’t mind, because we bought them for comfort and functionality.
Can't go wrong with New Balance and my daughter loves this color!

Velcro went kaput after 3 months. My kid told me this morning it wouldn’t latch. I took a look and the hook and loops are super short. Have been happy with it otherwise. Tempted to buy another pair, but annoyed the Velcro didn’t last.
These shoes have held up well for my very active little boy, age 2.

Review.review: Size 6.5W is true to size. Good quality.

We love these sneakers and just keep buying them! They’re super easy for the kids to put on themselves, and they love the springy bounce they feel. It’s a great quality shoe, comfortable in every way, they’re super cute, and they last until the kids grow out of them!

If you’re looking for quality and affordable shoes for your growing boy as I have, this brand and this shoes is the one. I have been buying these same shoes for my son to wear when he goes out to play. They are comfortable for him and I know because I have purchased several other brands and this is the one he always puts on. The bottom would almost be falling off and he still wears them. I had to tell him to let me know when it’s time for a new pair but I just keep track now by checking them every few months then weeks after it’s been a while.
Better satisfied…… shoe fits with room to spare!!🤗🤗
Good quality kids show, typically for the price range. Can be washed ok. Will wear out just as fast as other shoes, so if your looking for something that will extra long these are not the choice.

If you’re looking for great shoes for an older big kid, these are great! I purchased a size 7-wide for my 9 year old. The style is great, weight of the shoe is perfect and has a very easy closure. New Balance shoes are perfect for any kids that do not wear a regular width. I had also purchased a pair of Adidas sneakers and Nike. Both hurt the top of his feet. Great choice!
Ripped too early

I got these for my 5 year old daughter who has wide feet and complain abouts most shoes hurting. She goes on and on about loving these shoes so much and wanting to wear them "ever day"! I'm grateful to have found her shoes that not only feel good on her feet, but they are adorable. I just washed them in the washing machine for the 1st time and they held up well.

title: New Balance Kids' Fresh Foam X 860 V13 Lace-up Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, with true-to-size fit and plenty of room for toes to move comfortably. They receive positive feedback for their quality, with one customer noting they're recommended by a podiatrist, and customers like their style and arch support, describing them as a great stability shoe. The durability and value for money receive mixed reviews - while some say they're durable and worth the price, others report them falling apart and being overpriced.

Review.review: I’ve been running in the New Balance 860 for a few months now — usually 3 miles per run, at least 3 times a week — and I couldn’t be happier. As someone with wide feet, I’ve struggled for years to find running shoes that truly fit. I normally wear a women’s size 6 in length, but even in size 7.5 wide versions of many brands (including the highly recommended ASICS GT-2000 and Mizuno Inspire), my toes still felt cramped.Then I discovered that I could try wide-width boys’ shoes instead — and I regret not trying this sooner! The toe box in the New Balance 860 boys’ size 6 wide version gives me plenty of room for my toes to move comfortably, while still offering secure support around the entire foot. Breathability is excellent — even when walking outdoors in 90°F heat, I can feel airflow inside the shoe, which helps keep my feet cool and comfortable.The cushioning and support are great both for running and for long walks — my feet feel well-supported without any pressure points or stiffness. I highly recommend this option for other wide-footed runners — don’t overlook the possibility of trying boys’ sizes. I will definitely be buying these again!Bonus: the boys’ version costs less than women’s!

My son loves these shoes. He loved them so much we bought another pair in a larger size.  I love that we can get a width in shoes that fit him. We bought the stretchy laces so that he can just slip them on and off easily.
bought for my daughter, it is durable, lightweight and definitely worth the price. It was recommended by a podiatrist for kids shoes. I wish I bought this sooner.
My son loves these shoes! He is prone to find pain and the first thing he noticed was how comfortable they are. He has had them for a few weeks now and has not experienced any foot pain.

This is our third pair. After breaking her toe, my daughter's doctor recommended getting these in wide, which my daughter says she prefers over the mediums. Excellent quality and great for flat feet. Will purchase in all colors. Hope they continue to make these. Wish there was an adult version.
Comfortable fit for my active son’s wide feet

This is the brand and style of shoe I have worn for the past few years.  I was a little worried when the shoes arrived, the box had been slashed with a box cutter, therefore, worried me what kind of shape the shoes might be in. I examined them very closely for any cuts and other damage.  They were fine.
I loved the adult ones of these! But these didn't last nearly as long and they were narrower. I can wear kids and adult shoes and wanted to try these because they cost less, my mistake.

I purchased these for my 4 year old daughter. A great unisex shoe! They are so cute and matched several outfits. I was impressed with the price!

She didn't complain of tightness but it is very hard to get her foot in since there is not much give on the elastic shoe laces. She is very rough on shoes but so far they are holding up pretty good.
It's pretty  i got the for my son

title: New Balance Kids' 990 V6 Lace-up Sneaker

title: New Balance Kids’ New-b 1440 V1 Hook & Loop Running Shoe

Review.review: My son was getting shin splints from running around without proper shoes.These have been great when we are running around outside and he hasn’t had shin splinting since.They’re comfortable for him. Super easy to put on and off with the Velcro tops.Nice quality, correct size, color as described, good grip, can easily wash if needed and a great price for kid shoes!

I absolutely love how easy these are to get on. I’d been struggling to get my 4 year old’s feet shoved into his new size 11 shoes (he was comfortable in a size 9 mere weeks ago), then once they were on, they looked like boats and he struggled to walk around in them, but his toes would be red and irritated like they were crunched up in there.I ordered him a few pairs to try in assorted sizes, and it turned out the 10 wide was perfect. So if you’re like me trying to figure out your kid’s shoe size when they suddenly jump 2 sizes overnight, try the wide!
My son has chunky wide feet. They’re so comfortable for him and easy to take off and put on. Great for daycare and active kiddos. This color matches almost everything as well.
These sneakers are really cute and easy to put on but the way the Velcro is it comes off too easily. I like the hook style better but the quality and durability is great for a toddler otherwise.
The shoe does not work well for a wide foot. I bought it for my grandson and the Velcro will not stay closed. My daughter-in-law had already thrown away the packaging so I could not return it.
Love the easy on and off for toddler. Very comfortable. He calls them his fast shoes!

Bought for my daughter for her 2nd birthday. Usually wear adidas but big brother wears new balance bc of foot width and these have been a game changer for her. She loves these shoes and never wants to take off! Ordered 8.5 in toddler and very true to size and great buy for price!
Great shoes, these did not fall apart even after heavy use. Super stylish and worth every penny!

My kids loves them , very comfortable

title: New Balance Kids' 1440 V1 Lace-up Running Shoe

Review.review: We love new balance in our household because of the durability quality and style. My son wears wide shoes so the fact that they offer these in a wide is a great thing. They are comfortable to wear and have some arch support this is one of the only brands of shoes that he can wear due to his large width of foot. They fit true to size and the sole is a nice grippy rubber for running around.

Very pleased with the quality of these. We had went through several other brands in the last few months and they were all tearing, fraying, or functionally breaking with normal outside play within weeks of buying them. These are comfortable and we love the look. So glad to buy a well priced shoe that lasts. True to size, spacious fit for our son who can’t wear narrow shoes.

Great shoe. High quality. The size is accurate. The sole is rubber and my son doesn't slide around on smooth surfaces. The laces stay put when tied. He can get them on and off easy. And they are comfortable. Good cushion. I've also had to scrub them clean with a bristle brush and detergent and they held up great
True to size, held up well, good quality and price.
Lightweight, comfortable and a good looking shoe. The laces kinda thin and weird but we ordered some blue ones. Now he is really styling
These are great shoes! My daughter has a wide foot and New Balance is one of the only brands that offers wide in kid shoes. The quality is amazing and they are very durable. Color is true to picture.

My son is so picky with shoes.  We got these for school and wore them to Disney before school started.  After the 1st day at Disney walking 20,000 steps he said they were so comfortable.  He usually wears Nike so this was a win!

Update- after 2 months these have a hole in the side. For the money I expected them to last much longer! My son alternates between these and another pair so it’s not even daily use.Great for running and for every day shoes. They seem very well made and fit my wide-footed son perfectly!

title: New Balance Men's CT300 V3 Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable and well-fitting. However, the build quality and style receive mixed feedback - while some find them nice, others say they seem low quality and look stupid. Moreover, the size and color match are also mixed aspects, with some finding the size 100% recommend while others say they're 2 inches too big, and some praising the colorway while others say it doesn't match. Review.review: These are my son‘s favorite shoes. We were unable to get them at the shoe store however Amazon to the rescue. They’re exactly what he likes same brand quality, and size as he is used to.

These shoes are great stylish and casual shoes. I wear these to work and going out on the town. I have wide feet and comfortable stylish wide fit shoes are hard to find. The tongue is weird and foam like but it doesn't bother me. These are comfortable and look great. Would recommend for men with wide feet!
Love these sneakers. Very versatile. Can wear with almost anything.  Jeans, shorts, dress pants.
Shoes are really cool but, i asked for 9us men wide and they are too big! I have another pair of new balance skate style 9 size too and they are smaller. So im dissapointed because i cant wear it.

The New Balance CT300s are a great pair of sneakers overall. They’re comfortable right out of the box, with good build quality and a classic design that works well for everyday wear.However, one thing to note is the color. The blue tone shown in the product images appears darker and more saturated online, but in person, it’s noticeably lighter—more of a pastel blue. It's not a dealbreaker, but definitely something to keep in mind if you're aiming for a deeper navy look.Sizing is also solid. I ordered a size 8, and while they run just slightly on the bigger side, they still fit well and don’t cause any issues. No need to size up or down.All in all, a very good shoe that balances comfort and style—just be aware of the real-life color difference.

Love these.  Unlike other NB, namely the 515s & 574s, which run a size small, these 300s run true to size.  In the 515/574 models, I get a size 13 X-Wide, but I'm normally a size 12 Wide/X-Wide in any other shoe.  With these 300s, it's back to sanity:  12 Wide.  They fit perfectly.  My normal size, and the regular wide is wide enough.Plus, they have a versatile & flattering silhouette that goes with any pants, from sweats to jeans, and a colorway selection to fit all tastes.  Only thing to beware of:  They can scuff easily, so keep a magic eraser on hand and spray them with a guard to protect the suede and from staining.
Seems low quality but pretty and comfortable

Comfortable and the wide toe box, unlike other shoes, is virtually unnoticeable on the outside. Looks just like any other shoe. Comfortable and good looking shoe— A lil pricey for the materials involved and im not a fan of the random hole on the bottom exposing what I think is, midsole/inner sole.

title: New Balance Kids' DynaSoft Reveal V4 Boa Running Shoe

Review.review: Amazing pair of tennis shoes, my child loves it. Very comfortable and super easy to put on. No laces so ideal for you D kids too.

Bought these for my toddler to wear to k4. They fit great and have held up well so far. Supper easy to put on and tighten/loosen. Just washed them for the first time this weekend and they look great. Love the color

These are great shoes for kids who have narrow feet and need a tight fit without fighting shoes laces. The velcro cross straps always wear out on the others and other no tie shoes are too loose for my kids. The 1 star deduct is because the tops of the toes do wear out quicker than other shoes, esp. for the high price tag. We wear them every day to school and they lasted 1 semester (3 months) because of the toes, not size. We're on our 2nd pair 2nd semester and just bought these the next size up for beginning of the school year. True to fit also.

We love the New Balance BOA shoes. My son struggles with tying shoe laces, but still wants to wear "cool" shoes.New Balance always creates great colorways for their shoes and the BOA is no different--the design of the shoe is neat the way it crosses over to where you turn the dial to adjust and secure the fit.We've bought several pairs of these shoes over the years and find the quality is great. They live up to the way kids can be rough on shoes playing on the playground and he said they were really comfortable when he wore them during a recent Disney trip. He's put some miles on his current shoes and they are still going strong, but I'm going to order a pair to replace them for when the time comes.

Love these shoes so much! I love that there are no shoes laces that need to be tied constantly and that they are such a great comfortable fit that my kids put on and adjust themselves. They are super durable and it’s a great price. Gives great support - I honestly keep buying more in new colors!

My son loves these sneakers. He is not the most independent child and it is so nice that he can do these by himself - and that they are "tied" tight enough for him to run around without his shoes being loose. I highly recommend. Also, they look cool. They also last pretty well - this is our second pair - he is pretty rough on his sneakers and they held up very well.
My daughter loves these shoes.  We keep buying them as her feet grow.  Surprisingly narrow - we buy wide width even though she does not typically run wide in shoes.  Great value for the money.

I wanted to write a review after my child comments. Here is her opinion.I got these few month ago for my girl.She prefers White color and  Comfy BOA-Type Sneakers. She said incredibly impressed with both the design and functionality. These sneakers are a great blend of comfort, style, and practicality perfect for active during Gym class.#Pros:1. BOA Closure System– The standout feature of these sneakers is the BOA system, which makes putting them on and taking them off super easy. No more struggling with laces or velcro—just a quick twist and the shoes are snug and secure. My child loves how fast they can get ready, and I appreciate how it makes it hassle-free to get the right fit every time.2. Comfortable and Supportive – The sneakers provide great cushioning and support, which is key for growing feet. The lightweight design doesn’t weigh down my child, and the padded collar and tongue add an extra layer of comfort. After wearing them all day, there are no complaints about sore feet.3. Durable and Well-Made – New Balance is known for making durable shoes, and these are no exception. The material feels sturdy, and the rubber sole offers excellent traction, so my child can run, jump, and play without slipping or causing wear and tear on the shoes.4. Stylish Design – The all-white color with subtle New Balance branding gives these sneakers a clean, modern look. They pair easily with any outfit—whether it’s for sports, school, or casual wear. My child loves how trendy they look, and I love how versatile they are.5. Breathability – The upper material is breathable, helping to keep feet cool and dry during active play. I’ve noticed that these sneakers don’t trap moisture or cause any discomfort, which is a huge plus for all-day wear at school.#Cons:1. White Can Get Dirty Quickly – While the all-white design looks sleek, it does tend to get dirty quickly, especially in active kids. Regular cleaning is a must to keep them looking fresh.2. Price– Like most New Balance shoes, these sneakers are on the pricier side, but I do think the quality, comfort, and convenience justify the cost.===The New Balance Kids White Comfy BOA-Type Sneakers have been a fantastic choice for my girl. With the easy-to-use BOA system, comfortable fit, and durable construction, they’ve become a go-to pair for everyday wear. If you’re looking for a high-quality, stylish, and functional sneaker that will keep up with active kids, I highly recommend these!

title: New Balance Women's 877 V1 Walking Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these walking shoes comfortable, with feet feeling snuggled inside and plenty of room for toes. They receive positive feedback for their quality, appearance, and suitability for both walking and daily wear, with one customer noting the grey with bluish green laces combination looks great. The arch support receives mixed reviews - while some find it excellent, others report very little support. Size opinions are mixed, with some appreciating the generous width while others find them running large.

Review.review: This was my 5th order of these shoes.  Each pair has fit consistently and held up well with regular use.  They are comfortable right out of the box and fit well even with my orthotics in them.  The wide toe bed has helped my toes “breath” and not get squished in regular styled shoes with pointy toe beds.  Functionally, they are just what I need to relieve foot pain and are easy to put on and take off.  Overall quality has been great on every pair purchased.
The shoes are very comfortable and take a lot of wear and tear.

I’m a 9.5 AA and these shoes look good and fit to size.  There better than average and good support, comfortable at the ankle not too high.  I’m keeping them.  I can still bend down and tie my shoes, so why not!

I love these shoes! But I believe they are being discontinued.  Very upset as these are the only shoes I can find that actually work for me. They come in wide, with a nice wide toe box. Which is very hard to find. I normally take a 7 wide, but since they are not in stock and I needed a pair. Had to order a 7 x- wide. Which still works for me.Great value for your money!!

I liked the comfort of the shoe.  Plenty of room in the toe box.  The colors are muted grey, blue, and white and go with most other colors.  However, the area of my big toe is wearing out after approximately 2 months.  I received 11/26/24 and it is now February 9, 2025.  I paid almost $80 for these shoes.  I do not wear them all of the time, mostly to work out in 3 times a week.  I expected them to last at least a year.  Also, they were supposed to be made in the USA, and it says on the shoe that they were made in Vietnam.

I had been looking at these New Balance walking shoes for quite a while. Amazon’s price was marked down 20% during Prime days and I jumped on it. I had a previous pair of New Balance walking shoes that I wore 10-12 years. They were still in good shape but I needed a half size larger. Great value and I know they will last a long time. So comfortable at very first wearing. Love them. Good looking too.

I am very happy with these shoes. They fit great and are very comfortable. I have been wearing this brand for years since they offer wide sizes. My feet also sweat a lot in some shoes. These allow them to breathe better than most shoes, keeping my feet from feeling wet when I take them off.

I ordered a pair of these shoes last year and loved them, so I ordered another pair recently.  Right away I could tell something was not right with the second pair.  After examining them closely and comparing them with the first pair, I believe that the new ones are a knock-off.  The new shoes appear to be about a half size smaller, although the labels say they are the same size.  The roomy toe box in the original shoes ( which is an important feature for me) is narrower  and the contours of the shoes are almost straight up and down instead of curved to properly fit.  There are several other details that are "off." I promptly arranged to return the shoes and described my concerns.  I would still like to have a second pair, but am hesitant to order them again.

title: New Balance Kids' 480 V1 Lace-up Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable, with one noting the cushioned insole makes running softer on feet, and appreciate their true-to-size fit, particularly for wide feet. The shoes receive positive feedback for their style, with one customer highlighting their classic basketball-inspired design, while others praise their durability, with one mentioning they've lasted over a year of wear. Customers consider them great school shoes and good value for money.

Review.review: lance 480 V1 SneakersThe New Balance 480 V1 sneakers are a perfect blend of classic basketball-inspired design and everyday comfort. I picked them up recently and they’ve quickly become a staple in my wardrobe.Style:These have that vintage court shoe vibe with a clean, minimalist look that works well with a lot of outfits. Whether you’re into sporty streetwear or just want a low-key sneaker with subtle retro flair, the 480 V1 delivers. The “N” branding is bold without being flashy, and the overall silhouette is timeless.Comfort:For a sneaker based on a basketball silhouette, the comfort is impressive. The Ortholite insole gives you good support, and the padding around the ankle adds extra comfort. They’re great for all-day wear—walking around, running errands, or casual hangouts.Fit:They fit true to size for me. The toe box isn’t overly narrow, which is nice if you like a bit of room, and the laces allow for a secure fit. The leather upper is a bit stiff out of the box, but it softens up nicely with wear.Quality:The materials feel solid—especially for the price point. The leather upper feels durable, and the sole has good grip and traction. I’ve worn mine in a few different conditions, and they’ve held up really well.Final Verdict:If you’re looking for an everyday sneaker with heritage appeal, solid comfort, and clean styling, the New Balance 480 V1 is a great option. It’s easy to wear, well-made, and offers that classic New Balance feel without the bulk of some of their other models.⸻

I live New Balance sneakers for the high quality and support they give my preschoolers feet! These fit well, are easy to wipe clean and the price is great for the high quality. I love the white and blue colors for spring. My 3 year old can slip them on easily, they are lightweight and wide enough for his foot.

Took FOREVER to get to me, but they are still going strong! Good quality and true to size. My child never complained about them being uncomfortable, so I guess they are comfy. For them to last this long, I think they are worth the price. The color is perfect, super easy to style! They are easy to clean too! I take a baby wipe to them (don't judge me) and that does the trick!

I bought the New Balance Kid's 480 V1 Lace‑up Sneakers for my daughter, and they’ve been fantastic. They’re lightweight, comfy, and offer good support for all-day wear. The lace-up design keeps them snug, and the cushioned insole makes running and playing much softer on her feet. She loves the sporty look, and they’ve stayed clean and sturdy after daily use. The fit was true to size and they didn’t need breaking in. Overall, they feel well‑made and durable. We’re very happy with these shoes — they’re a great pick for active kids!

These are cool and I want a pair for myself actually. My daughter only used to like Nike AF 1's and I told her that NB are way more comfy. She has no Idea who Ozzy Osbourne was, it's not her generation, but I tried explaining to her that NB were his favorite because of their comfort. She loves them now and are her favorite pair of shoes now, not because of Ozzy, but because they're stylish and comfortable.

These are so cute! They definitely work for running around and playing as well as pairing with dressy casual. The wide toe box is important for my kids. My boys play hard and these have held up. Also easier to clean bc of the leather exterior. I have a lot of kids and I come back to these.
Nice shoe but it’s very heavy on my baby’s foot only put it on to go out and remove them after about an hour
These were the perfect size, they’re comfortable, and easy to put on, 🤣 according to my son.

title: New Balance Mens Minimus Tr V2
Customer_say: Customers find these cross training shoes to be of good quality, comfortable, and supportive, with one customer noting the wide grippy sole for stability. The shoes look great, and one customer mentions they perform well for strength training. Customers disagree on the fit and size, with some finding them too narrow. Customers disagree on the slipperiness of the shoes.

Review.review: This is the 2nd time I’ve purchased these shoes for my adult son. He absolutely loves them. Good quality and lightweight.

This is an excellent New Balance minimal cross training shoe. The shoe runs a half size small, so go up when you order, and I got the wide fit for additional room. Nice wide grippy sole for stability with Minimus zero drop profile. Although, I'll admit that adding a lightweight padded insole would make these supreme. I love NB Minimus shoes and was disappointed when NB got rid of their Minimus running line...My only complaints are the neoprene tongue because it slides a bit and the size issue which hints at lower production QA standards for New Balance. Regardless, it's a great lightweight zero drop shoe, especially if you can get them on sale. Easily 4 stars, 5 if my regular size fit out of the box.Pro-Tip: run the laces over themselves at the last loops for DIY lace lock. See pic.
Very well made.  These are a tad more narrow than past models.  But over all....love these shoes.
Took a chance with these being minimalist shoes. Excellent fit and support for lifting and body weight exercising. My feet no longer slide around inside my shoes. Definitely will buy again.
Lack of comfort. Very hard sole.
This is my 3rd pair of Minimus I have bought. All with great fit and quality. These ones fit and feel great.

I have been wearing a prior version of this Minimus Trainer for a while now, and love them, but I wanted a new pair.  So, I immediately purchased these, in the same size as my current pair (11 Wide).  However, I cannot wear these for more than a few minutes before my feet start to hurt, and I can't lace them loosely enough to prevent them from making my feet feel choked.  When I was running ultra marathons, the Minimus Road and Minimus Trail were my go to shoes.  Those were also size 11 Wide and the fit and comfort were also amazing.  In my opinion, the changes made in the Minimus Trainer v2 are a disaster for anyone with wide feet.  If you have wide feet, my suggestion is to look elsewhere for your training shoes.
Very comfy. Could use a little more arch support, but that is just preference.

Review.review: The New Balance FuelCell V7 Youth Turf-Trainer shoes are fantastic! They offer great comfort and support for my kid on the baseball field, with excellent traction on turf surfaces. The shoes feel durable and well-made, holding up through intense practices and games. Plus, the design looks sharp and sporty, which my kid loves. These trainers give confidence and performance combined with comfort—definitely a five-star pick for young athletes!

As a coach, i love the comfort of these shoes, nice and wide toe box. Enough traction for the infield so i dont slip when throwing bp. Only downside is it fits slightly big, these are half size bigger than nikes, but still amazing

I purchased these for my HS aged daughter. She said they are the most comfortable turf shoes / cleats she’s ever worn. Great quality and comfort for the price. She’s usually a 7 in women but can wear a 5.5 in kids so we drop down and save the extra $ why girls want white shoes on these red fields I’ll never know but she loves them. Style is nice, not to bulky but also not slim like Nike cleats. Decent grip for both turf fields and dirt fields.

My son absolutely loves these shoes! He has used these for baseball turf games and flag football as well. I would highly recommend these shoes to anyone in sports or just a good everyday shoe.https://amzn.to/3IKflE9
My son's favorite cleats. great for kids with a wide foot. very comfy

My son has feet conditions where he can’t wear spiked cleats but can wear turf cleats. These fit perfect and he has no complaints. Comfortable. Fits true to size. They did last one full season (March-June) before the toe part started to come off.

Ordered this item 3 weeks ago and it got lost. I don’t know who was responsible for it being lost but after it didn’t show up for 3 days after it was supposed to I took the refund option which I received in my account 3 days after choosing the refund. Decided to order these again and they showed up on time and in perfect condition. My daughter got to use them during her softball tournament and said they are so much more comfortable than her cleats. She had great traction on the turf, and the insoles have lots of cushion. title: New Balance Men's 806 V1 Tennis Shoe

Review.review: Comfortable, like walking on clouds. Fit perfectly.  Always buy NB. For tennis too.
Great support and padding.  Exactly what I need for pickelball.  Super value.

I'd have to say this shoe is by far the most comfortable slip resistant shoe that I have purchased so far. I've bought Shoes For Crews and they suck, and were very expensive as well. Then I bought more expensive shoes by "Florsheim" but the slip resistant aspect of the shoe was poor and not comfortable after a long days work. However, these New Balance are exactly what I was searching for!!! They're really comfortable, as well as slip resistant. Inky thing is the size issue. I ordered my normal size, a size 10 W,  and the fit was a little bit too snug. I wore them for the day, and they eventually loosened up a bit. Overall, if I had to buy this shoe again, I would!!!

In my opinion this is a very good, supportive tennis shoe.  Many others shared that they felt this shoe was running small so I ordered it a half-size larger than normal.  They were too big; I returned them and ordered my usual size, and they fit perfectly.

The most recent pair of Newbalance  shoes I ordered (NB 806) did not live up to my expectations. I have bought several pairs of NB1006 (have been unable to find lately) in the past several years and have always been very pleased with the way they fit, their comfort and their durability. The pair of NB806 I most recently purchased that was specified to be the same size as all the pairs previous ordered was not wide enough nor long enough. I returned the first pair and ordered a wider (4E) pair as a replacement.  These were also very tight across the width of the shoe and very uncomfortable. Although I continued to try to wear them past the return deadline thinking they would loosen up, they have been very uncomfortable and I will not purchase Newbalance shoes like this in the future.  Some of my friends that I play pickleball and tennis with who have purchased the NB806 tell me they have also had the same experience as me.

I got a pair of these at Goodwill and they felt like the most comfortable shoes I'd ever worn, except they were too narrow. So I tracked down the official New Balance size charts and ended up here buying a men's size 9.5 Wide (hobbit feet, I guess). The metatarsal support really helps my feet feel better longer when I'm on them for hours at a time. Truly a revelation for me as I've never had arch problems, but that extra bit of support--the insole already has a good arch support--makes a big difference!

They look nice, people do seem to notice them. The shoe body does not hold up well. The rubber on the shoe sole wears and separates very quickly. The foam seems to break down quickly or not provide enough support leading to foot pain. The traction of the shoe on wet surfaces is great and these things are very water tight. These shoes do not breath very well. I walk alot for my job and for exercise, 1-3 miles per day, these are lasting about 3-4 months for each pair. For the price it’s not the best shoes I have owned. I did buy multiple pairs to start with due to a sale price and because I am rough on shoes. I won’t be reordering more.

Why did you pick this product vs others?:This was the only style that came in a 9 !/2 B.  I don't play tennis but this is definitely the best fitting and attractive sport shoe in my closet.Style:I lke the square toe, supportve fit, and textured medium gloss finish.

Review.review: Perfect fit! Great price paid for New/yet Used.  Typically, I require a EEE width…the xwide width works perfectly!  Great quality and look that matches anything!  Super comfy.
Just got them and they fit perfect. If you have a lot of swelling in your feet as I do you will love the Velcro .

These shoes are easy to put on and you don't have to bother tying your shoes (mine like to come untied) and I can wear them to work as well as anywhere else. The only things to watch out for are that the tongue is a bit long and it pokes my shin, though the shoes feel like they are about 1/2 size larger than what I get with my Brooks shoes. I have room in both the front and back but they stay in place because of the straps.

So, the way I got turned on to these shoes was through a friend. She is an older working woman, (I am a young working woman), and she gave me a pair of these that she had worn through and let me tell you man, those were genuinely the most comfortable pair of shoes I’ve ever worn. My feet are wide and the shoes were not, so due to them being so comfortable, I was then forced to buy a new pair and they are just wonderful. I genuinely couldn’t recommend these enough. They offer great arch and ankle support, they’re ridiculously comfortable, and they’re really cute chunky white dad shoes. My one note is that they run a little narrow, so if you have a wider foot you may want to buy a wide pair in your size rather than just going up a size. Seriously tho,  I never write reviews, but these shoes are so good I had to. Highly recommend them especially for older people, (but I also love them as a 26 yr old). The shoe size I purchase was an 8 1/2 wide and they fit perfectly. These shoes are so good that when they eventually are ran through, I’m planning on just buying another identical pair. I’m almost certain these are the only pair of tennis shoes I’m going to wear for years to come.

I'm not sure if this is just better for people with specific types of feet, but it hurt mine and I couldn't keep it. The "tongue" of the shoe is a bit sturdy and hurts the upper area of my foot, and the support on the bottom feels a bit flat. Maybe I'm just too picky, idk. I bought this because a friend has it and it looks suuper cute. She's on her 2nd pair and absolutely loves it--says it fits her perfectly and that it is super comfortable!I guess it might just be my feet's format that's weird.In either case, it's a good quality shoe! The material is great, very sturdy and padded!

As a bartender I walk an average of 10,000 steps a day. Constantly running food, delivering drinks, and retrieving all the much needed stock. It keeps your feet dry and snug without being tight and easy to take on and off without having to readjust or tie shoelaces throughout the day. Not a pretty or ugly pair of shoes. Which is great. Super slip resistant and last me an average of 8 months. I have flat feet so I do add an insert, but these are still much more comfortable in comparison to alot of slip proof work shoes.

I wasn’t so sure when I first got these, they are heavier then what I usually wear but recommended by my orthopedic surgeon.  Well I bought wide width and wow they are great for walking.  I’m much steadier on my feet and they give me the support I need.  I did buy back of heel pads due to bone spurs so extra good.

title: New Balance Unisex-Adult FuelCell 4040 V7 Turf Trainer Baseball Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these turf shoes comfortable and well-fitting, with one noting the grip nubs are perfectly sized for everyday wear. Review.review: Best pair of turf shoes I ever bought. Fit is perfect, love that New Balance offers wide and extra wide as an option. As described, the shoes are extremely light and makes movements feel effortless. Will definitely be purchasing again.

My softball player loves these! She said they fit well, are very comfortable and are very lightweight when worn. The turf bottoms get very good traction for her as a catcher. Overall great shoe quality and will definitely buy again when these need replacing. The white color is very unique, too, and even has a suttle design in the side mesh area.

The most comfortable trainers I have ever owned. Background: I was a semi-pro DH MTB rider for years, then Ironman Triathlete, and Marathoner (best time 2:56.25). I know what it takes to push the limits and now that I am playing in a very competitive adult baseball league, I know that: comfort, light weight and stability are valued benefits from a training shoe.I play Adult BB as a catcher and these trainers have added protection at the front of the toe without sacrificing mobility or comfort. The light weight foam allow me to wear these shoes just about everywhere, and the grip nubs are perfectly sized for everyday wear. The grip/traction is amazing on every surface, not just turf! Grass, dirt, concrete, slab cement, aluminum, etc… have all been tested and I have excellent traction.I removed the stock laces and replaced them with bungee laces (this allows more even top-foot pressure across the foot - something I learned from years as a marathoner and triathlete).Highly recommend these trainers for anyone serious about their training or that just appreciate a comfortable and capable athletic shoe.I usually purchase size 10 for all of my shoes, and these are no different. Just order your normal size and your will be good to go.I have normal width feet but I’m more flat footed than most people I know. The toe box fits comfortably secure and does not move around, while the heel are stays put like it should. What little “arch” I do have does feel supported, which contributes to the overall comfort.Highly recommend!

Great price at time of purchase ( < $70).  Extremely comfortable athletic-specific shoe.  Fits well around foot and ankle.  Quality components and may take a few accidental cleatings on field or in dugout.  Vibrant color as well.  Just a great product when acquired at right price.

He wears these now to play in his men's slow pitch softball league.

Whether you're playing soccer, football, or just need a good pair of turf shoes, these are a solid choice!

The New Balance Men's 237 V1 Sneaker seamlessly blends vintage aesthetics with contemporary comfort, making it a standout addition to any casual footwear collection.Design & Aesthetics:Drawing inspiration from 1970s running shoes, the 237 V1 features a sleek silhouette complemented by an oversized 'N' logo, exposed foam tongue, and a mix of suede and mesh materials. However, individuals with particularly wide feet might consider sizing up for optimal comfort.ZAPPOSDurability & Materials:Crafted with durable suede and mesh, the 237 V1 is designed to withstand regular use. The quality materials not only enhance longevity but also contribute to the shoe's breathable nature, making it suitable for warmer climates.SOLERACKSVersatility:The retro-inspired design, combined with a variety of colorways, allows the 237 V1 to complement a wide range of casual attire. Its versatile design and reliable construction make it a valuable addition to any casual wardrobe. For those seeking a fashionable yet comfortable sneaker, the 237 V1 is a commendable choice.

title: Nike Men's Air Monarch IV Training/Workout Shoes
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, well-fitting, and good value for money. They receive positive feedback for their appearance and arch support, particularly noting they provide good support for side-to-side motion and walking and working out. The durability receives mixed reviews - while some say they hold up well, others report issues with the rubber separating from the sole. Customers also mention the shoes squeak badly and are very noisy.

Review.review: These are often called "grandpa" shoes because they look a little clunky but they are still the best shoes I have found for exercise classes and basketball in that they are extremely stable through the last and I have not had an ankle turn since I started wearing them yeas ago. The bottoms of my feet are sensitive with minor neuropathy and these shoes fit wonderfully and wrap the foot well. The pivot point is great for people who take a cardio, Jazzercise, Shine, or equivalent class in that it facilitates turns, spins, and rapid direction changes.I do have to get a full size larger in Nike shoes (in all Nike clothes for that matter). After a couple of months of heavy use these Air shoes will start to squeak, often quite loudly, well before they wear out. I simply remove the lining  from the shoes and put baby or other talcum powder into the tiny holes under the lining and work it into the holes. This has served me well for years to stop the squeak and it has the additional benefit of freshening up my shoes.I have tried numerous shoe brands over the years and the only shoe that came close to the comfort and stability of this shoe is the Strutter from Adidas, which is no longer made to my knowledge and didn't last as long anyway.One thing Nike could do better is to more firmlyvsecure the sole to the body of the shoe. The glue used by Nike to secure the rubber part of the sole is the first part of the shoe to fail, especially if these shoes get wet regularly from rain or wet grass or even puddles when going to and from your car and the gym classes. I can normally get 6 to 8 months out of the shoes and I have at least 8 one hour classes of various intensity a week (and I do my best to keep the bottoms dry!).For those who wear orthotics, these shoes take them well whether they are heel focused, toe focused, or cover the whole foot. I now wear Goodfeet orthotics and they are quite comfortable in this shoe.

I recently picked up these amazing shoes for my 11-year-old, who is super picky about both style and comfort. I took a chance and chose them without his input—he usually says no to everything! Imagine my excitement when he opened the box and exclaimed, “Mom, I LOVE these!” He couldn’t stop raving about how comfy they are, and his favorite feature? They’re not just easy to slip on, but they also give him a little extra height with thick but soft soals! If you’re on the hunt for a pair that combines style, true to size, comfort, a boost in height, and lets not forget the colors are deep bright and excellent combination,these Nike shoes are an absolute must-have!

I bought the Nike Air Monarch shoes, and they are amazing! Very comfortable, supportive, and perfect for all-day wear. The fit is true to size, and the quality feels great. Definitely recommend for walking, gym, or everyday use!

And the black is not discreet either. Wish they offered a medium gray version.

title: Under Armour Men's Charged Assert 9 Running Shoe
Customer_say: Customers find these running shoes comfortable, well-designed, and lightweight, offering good value for money. They appreciate the fit, with one customer noting they're available in wide sizes. The durability receives mixed feedback - while some say they're holding up great, others report they wear down quickly. The sizing is also mixed, with some finding them true to size while others say they run small.

Review.review: Honestly one of the best shoes on the market for wide foot people, if your looking to snag a simple set of running sneakers, in my opinion. Here's some in-depth info along with  pro's and con's:TLDR: Great quality shoes for the price, and easy to clean. Recommend to beginner and intermediate runners/hikers, experts may be willing to pay more money for increase of quality.PROs:- Perfect Fit. I usually wear 9.0 wide (USA), so that is what I ordered and it fit perfectly.- Comfort and Ease. I like how comfortable they are and they are easy to slip on and off (if you wish) by the use of the heel pull tab. The tab also prevents the heel from getting bunched in or broken when putting on the shoes, which was a frequent problem with some other brands I have owned in the past.- Easy to Clean, Quality Mesh. I have seen some reviews saying these shoes wear out easily or the mesh is easier to damage. YMMV but I didn't seem to have this issue and I've had these shoes for about a year. IMO I find the mesh to be much more durable than the cloth mesh most sports shoes have these days and much easier to clean, which is essential for anyone like myself, who often hikes or runs in forestry/mud.- Above Average Quality. As for the year timeframe, the 1st set was about 8 months of extreme use, then I purchased a 2nd pair which I've had for about 3 months now. This may seem like a short timeframe to some but for me, I usually have to change shoes every 6 months or less if they are lower quality because they get a lot of mileage and use. I still have the 1st set which I use as "lawn mowing shoes", as they are still usable but the tread does not get much grip/traction anymore for running. I liked them enough to buy that 2nd pair instead of some other brand/model.- Decent Arch Support and Sole Tread. You will find other shoes with the same or better, but I didn't see many that were this cheap in price.- Part of Amazon's "Try Before You Buy". Free try-ons. You can take up to 6 days to decide whether to keep/return if you wish, and only be charged if not returned by the 7th day. Day 1 is the day they are delivered.- Uniform in Color. The shoe currently comes in all-black or all-white, including the logo. YMMV but this is a pro for me due to work restrictions requiring all-black shoes, so I can also wear them leisurely at work if I choose (I'm a mechanic). Great for anyone with the same issue, or military, etc.CONs:- Not the most expert/elite quality shoe out there, but will definitely check most people's boxes for average needs, imo.- Cost is higher than one might desire for just simple leisure shoes. But as an avid runner, the price is about average. However, they are usually on sale. My 1st set was around 40% off which dropped it from $70-something to $43, which was worth it for me. 2nd set was about 20% off. Winter holiday seems to be the best time for sales price.- Tread pattern is smooth and circular, instead of rigid and square/triangle, in case that matters to you (in regards to rock climbing etc)Overall I was surprisingly satisfied with this shoe model personally, but your mileage may vary.
