title: Reebok Womens Club C 85 Vintage Tennis Sneakers for Women, Casual White Womens Shoes
Customer_say: Customers find these tennis sneakers cute, comfortable, and well-made, appreciating their versatility as they go with many outfits. Customers consider them good value for money. The fit and size receive mixed feedback - while some say they're true to size, others find them too narrow. The arch support is also mixed, with several customers noting it lacks support.

Review.review: Comfortable, vintage style, teenager girl approved

My favorite shoe of ever I have bought this shoe for literally five years straight a new pair probably every 5 months I just love the way they look and lowkey wear out because there’s not a lot of foot support but they’re just so cute and go with everything

I recently purchased the Reebok Women’s Club C 85 Vintage Walking Shoe and couldn’t be happier. These shoes offer excellent cushioning and support, making them comfortable for long walks and daily wear.The vintage design is stylish and pairs well with almost any outfit. They fit true to size (normally size 8; ordered size 8) and feel great all day long.Overall, I highly recommend these shoes for anyone seeking a stylish, comfortable, and versatile sneaker. They have exceeded my expectations!

My favorite white sneakers so comfortable and have held up through rain and other extremes. These are my second pair and I love them so much! They crease easily but I don’t mind. Not the best walking shoes but they’re doable for mediumish distances. They’re pretty flat shoes so if you’re looking for ankle support, try another shoe! I love these and will continue to buy them.

I have wanted these shoes for over a year, but couldn't justify spending the cash. However, when I saw they'd dropped like $20, I went for it. I was nervous that they wouldnt fit my feet given the reviews and even considered buying two sizes/sizing up - I'm glad I didnt. I am a size 8, but sometimes wear a 7.5 in larger shoes i.e. Merrells. In New Balances, I can wear either a 7.5 or 8 usually. I wear an 8 in tevas/old navy flip flops. This shoe is definitely narrow, but I have narrow feet! I actually tried an 8.5 on in person to see if I should size up and let me tell you - I had clown feet. The 8.5 was creepily long on me. So I ordered the size 8 here and they fit perfectly! They're the perfect length for my feet and I actually have a little bit of wiggle room around my ankles so they're easy to slip on and off w/out messing up i.e., crushing the back of the shoe or having to untie them. Longer shoe laces would be nice, but thats something I could get on my own. These shoes don't provide much arch support, but they're comfy for walking around and running errands/being on campus for the day. They do rub a little on the back ankle if you're wearing shorter socks so beware of that - I just wear ankle socks now.This is a super detailed review, but I wanted to actually give some pointers instead of labeling these as good/bad.
I love these sneakers. Trendy throwback with comfort and style. True to size, looks good with jeans, sweats and joggers. I wear them a lot, great price and quality. Highly recommend.
Great looking but too narrow and short. I'm going to size up and see if they work because I do like the look.
They came in the original box and were super cute with every outfit! They fit true to size and are great quality and easy to clean! Would recommend for a daily casual shoe especially for the price!

title: Reebok Womens DMX Comfort + Slip-on
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers extremely comfortable, excellent for walking, and appreciate their color and style. They are lightweight and provide good support, with one customer noting the cushioning moves with the foot. Customers consider them good value for money. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some find them a great fit, others mention they run narrow and are not suitable for wide feet.

Review.review: It was really important to me to have some comfortable shoes to workout in, but other shoes that are similar to these are extremely expensive. Since I am already familiar with the Reebok brand, I thought I would give these a try. I really like these shoes because they are not pricey and the DMX Comfort + sneakers in Chalk White/Purple are very pretty! These shoes have been great for me as I'm trying to incorporate more walking and exercise into my daily routine. My walks around the neighborhood and workouts on the treadmill and exercise bike are much more enjoyable because they provide the perfect combination of comfort and support. In addition, the sleek design and vibrant colors make these sneakers a fashion statement. They are a great option for anyone looking for a comfortable and stylish workout shoe.

I bought these for my daughter and she loves them! A great fit, very comfortable and very lightweight! She wears them all the time and loves the color! She highly recommends these shoes to anyone who wants durability, stylish, true to size and so comfortable!😀

I have many years of buying shoes of all kinds.  I have a very standard size 10 shoe.  I have often had heel spurs, arch support problems, etc.  I purchased the bright-ish orangie color for 29.98 while on a Today show special.  I got to admit, I did not have much hope that these would be any different than the other 20 pairs of tennis shoes sitting in my closet in various stages of use BUT... they are. These are THE MOST COMFORTABLE pair of walking shoes I have ever had.  EVER.  I bought another pair today before writing this review.  The shoes are light and airy, and extremely comfortable on the first day!!  Hope your experience will be the same!

These are very very comfortable and fit to size. I was looking for good women's walking sneakers. These were recommended on a women's health site. They are light weight and well cushioned. My only caution and the reason for 4 instead of 5 stars is this.  The sides of the tongue are sewn onto the body of the sneaker so the opening is a little narrow and can't be expanded when you slide you foot in.  I think this would be a problem if you have a wide foot.  I have a more narrow foot so they are perfect for me.  The black sneakers were 1/2 the price of the other colors so they were a great value for me.

I ordered these prior to going on a weeklong trip abroad where I’d be walking a lot. I logged about 10 miles per day and these shoes were great for my knees. I was mostly walking on sidewalks/paved areas, but a couple days were on dirt trails and the shoes were still great. I ordered my usual size (9.5) and they fit well length-wise. As other reviews stated, they were a bit tight on the sides, but I broke them in after the first day (it wasn’t difficult and I didn’t have any foot pain). I’d recommend them!
Cute, simple, and comfy. I've had them for several months at this point. I have high arches and these support very well. Great buy especially for the cost.

What sold me on these shoes was the non slip bottoms and the the stay dry ability.  They are heavier than my other shoes but not as heavy as some others.  Good arc support as I get plantar fasciitis easy.  I think I ordered up a half size and that was perfect. I have a messed up knee on the right side so these shoes do help with the compensation on the left.  Great Prime Day purchase. Recommend if you need a supportive shoe.Update:  What I loved about the shoes I now dislike.  They cause me more foot /heal pain the longer I wear them. I cannot wear them for extended periods.
These are a tight fit so if you have wide feet, these won’t be for you. Other than that these are great! Super lightweight, durable & easy to clean..

title: Reebok Men's Floatride Run 2.0 Running Shoe

Review.review: Good fit and comfortable

Run fast ? Yes , however, please wear thicker socks, i got blisters from it. Midsoles are firm but for fast tempo or faster, or even race day 5k maybe 10k ? Its still a good shoe. Gripss are real good.

So, I never actually ran in these, but all I had to do is try them on to feel how tight/narrow they are. They look awesome, look/feel fast and I wanted them to be more comfortable, but I need a larger toe box.

This is my second pair of these shoes.  They are of great quality and great price.  The amount of technology in the shoe is worth the price.  Cushion and bounce back are very comfortable.  Great for short or long distances.

This Shoe is fantastic when it comes to comfortableness, like you are walking on Billows, yet it has one issue, it's not true to the size, I always wear 13 and it loose for me where I enjoy space while this one is a bit tide and long toes don't enjoy enough room as usual with any 13 Reebok I had or have now.
Pierces the top of the big toes, horribly uncomfortable and runs small.

These running shoes are very good for high arches with a half insole added, but they’re very poorly made. After running less than 50 miles, there was a chunk missing from one of the soles and they starting splitting/fraying elsewhere. I will probably try another pair because I’ve had difficulty finding running shoes that support my arches (even with high arch insoles) but don’t have high hopes.
This is a good, comfortable, lightweight, durable shoe. Great value. Good vendor. Fast delivery.

title: Reebok Mens Nano X2 TR Adventure Fitness Outdoor Athletic and Training Shoes

Love my Reeboks! I've been wearing Reeboks for 30+ years because of their fit, look and comfort. These are no exception. These have really good support and are great for working out or just daily wear. This particular shoe runs small by half a size. I ordered a half size larger than what I normally wear to get a little extra room, but they are no bigger, in fact, the size 8.5 I received is the exact length of the size 8 I had been wearing.
Excelente calidad
Great for CrossFit. The sole came off quickly in the middle where it’s supposed to be strong for rope climbing
My husband love it!  The quality style support, everything is perfect.

Diseño resistente: están construidas con materiales duraderos que resisten el desgaste por lo que veo pero no le he dado tanto uso como para asegurar eso, hasta el momento todo OK, ofrecen una buena protección en terrenos variados.Versatilidad: Estas zapatillas están diseñadas para adaptarse a diferentes tipos de entrenamiento, desde levantamiento de pesas y ejercicio cardiovascular hasta actividades al aire libre. Brindan un buen equilibrio entre estabilidad y flexibilidad, permitiendo movimientos ágiles y proporcionando soporte para los pies en diversas actividades.Amortiguación y comodidad: Las Nano X2 Tr Adventure ofrecen una amortiguación adecuada para absorber el impacto durante actividades de alto impacto, brindando comodidad adicional a los pies, pero si eres de tener empeine alto no se que tan bueno sea el ajuste, diría que esta zapatilla no esta hecha para personas con el empeine alto. Además, cuentan con una plantilla acolchada que ofrece una sensación de suavidad y soporte adicional durante el uso prolongado.Agarre y tracción: La suela de goma de estas zapatillas está diseñada para proporcionar un buen agarre y tracción en diferentes superficies, incluyendo terrenos irregulares y resbaladizos. Esto es especialmente útil si planeas utilizarlas en actividades al aire libre, como caminatas o senderismo ligero.Estilo y apariencia: Las Reebok Men's Nano X2 Tr Adventure tienen un diseño atractivo y moderno, con opciones de colores llamativos. que al que le guste llamar la atencion, seguro que lo hara con unas de estas zapatillas. Esto las convierte en una opción versátil tanto para el entrenamiento como para el uso casual, permitiendo combinarlas con diferentes conjuntos de ropa.En resumen: muy buena zapatillas si pagas el precio correcto.
Cannot beat the price. These shoes look great and fit well. They have a wider toe and are breathable. Very flexible and easy to wear.

These are very comfortable, light weight, and really hold your foot in securely. I wore these to walk Augusta national and they didn’t disappoint. Roughly 20,000 steps later and my feet were still comfortable. They breathe very well and don’t make your feet sweat like crazy. So far they are holding up well and seem to be very durable.

Review.review: I actually bought these shoes for my nine year old son.  He absolutely loves them!  I do worry about the color getting dirty, but so far they haven't been any worse than could be expected from a boy who plays outside all the time. If that changes, I'll be sure to update this review.  But as for now, it's great to see them holding up, and a little water has washed off any dirt.  My son even swears he runs faster in them!
these shoes ripped near the stiches with in 2 days of wearing them and my 8 year old was so disappointed.Totally unsatisfied as we did not expect this from reebok.

So my advice is to get your normal size if you normally size up.  I am happy with my purchase, however, and I like the quality of this shoe.  It is super lightweight and seems well made.  My son is hard on shoes, so we shall see how well they hold up.

Bought these for my 5 yr old and he loves them, they are a really nice shoe! but Reebok to me seem to run a little narrow, which is ok since my child has a narrow foot but you will need to get a Wide if your child's foot is wider. I got the size 11 and they fit him great...not any room to grow in but fit him in the size he is in right now great.

Supper cute my son loved them they are light and bendable, hasn't worn them yet though because I ordered them one size bigger just in case so he will be wearing them once he grows out of all his old ones.

I'm giving 2 stars for initial fit and style only. But ZERO stars for durability. Unfortunately my son has only worn these shoes less than 30 days and the tread at the bottom is peeling off. At the bottom of the shoe there is black rubber woven into the yellow sole; this is what is peeling apart from the shoe. In addition, these are not his only shoes he wears so he hasn't even given them heavy use.
After I used this shoes for a month, they become very smelly. I did washed them twice and had to get ride of them. Waste of money.

title: Reebok Men's Ultra 7 DMX Max Walking Sneakers Shoe

However, the durability receives mixed reviews, with one customer reporting the bottom coming off, and customers find the shoes squeaky.

Review.review: The Reebok DMX line of sneakers has been my favorite footwear since 1997, due to its extremely comfortable insole, good quality, and endurance.  Reebok outlets and other stores that sell the brand and DMX line don't always have my size in stock. Amazon does, along with swift delivery.
The product is as described, fast delivery, and excellent service. The price is considerably good, and the packaging was adequate for mailing.

I am very overweight but I always had excuses as to why I didn't want to walk, my feet hurt, my shoes were uncomfortable and I didn't have the strength.  My g/f pushed me to go to the website for the shoe store and use their suggestions to find a comfortable shoe (As I am not doing an endorsement for them, I won't mention the store).I selected this and I put it on and it hurt my left foot as normal for me, I was about to return it and be disappointed yet again but I decided to simply adjust how it fits by the laces.  First adjustment, it was flopping as it was not secure, the second adjustment did the trick.  Now instead of being sedentary, this big boy is knocking down a mile a day, almost every day, steadily increasing to now 1.5 miles a day and I have no intention of stopping.Comfort, security, confidence, all packaged in this show.  Walk on brothers and sisters.

They are quality shoes and I was going to give them a lower score only because if you are older or have balance issues don't buy these.The center of the sole is raised and it causes balance issues and I didn't have any before.I would buy the brand again as usual but not this specific shoe.You actually feel like you are walking on a tight rope.A bit dangerous for me at least.

These shoes are comfortable... however that is quickly replaced with a very loud and distinctive squeak with every step you take. I have bought 3 pairs of these shoes.Returned the first pair thinking it was just that shoe. Then ordered a spare pair before the replacements arrived. A mistake.Guess what they all squeak!Does not matter if your in the grass, concrete, or halls.I would avoid these shoes as it seems they are all defective.I will wear them to cut grass or just throw them away. The squeaking is ridiculous.If any shoe executives are reading this. The problem is when you step forward and lift your toes it squeaks.My second pair I have worn for several weeks so its not a break in period

I wear a 14 4E and have had to settle for what ever was in stock in my size and while some of them were good it always took a month or two of breaking in before I noticed my feet didn't hurt anymore. These shoes were heaven from the first step. I only pray they don't discontinue or change the shape because these are perfect for my big feet! I will probably buy another pair just in case. BTW in the last year I have purchased Sketchers and New Balance and will problably never use them again unless I know I am stepping into something fowl.
At first they were nice. After a couple weeks one shoe went flat. They had air I believe in the soles or something anyway. Then they hurt my feet and I couldn’t wear them anymore.

These fit perfectly all leather, like I said these walking shoes are excellent for running hiking walking shoes. Very comfortable nice style nice feeling to your feet during your walk. I purchased them on Amazon prime day last week and I’m definitely going to try to get another pair. Get them while they’re still in stock somewhere?

title: Reebok Unisex-Adult Nano Court Sneaker
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable, stylish, and lightweight, with great support and positive feedback about their quality, particularly for tennis and pickleball. The fit receives mixed reviews - while some say they fit great, others find them too narrow. The durability and heel angle also get mixed feedback, with some noting they have enough durability to last and one customer appreciating the heel-to-toe drop, while another finds the higher heel angle problematic.

Review.review: Never had better court shoes! They are a bit hard to put on, but once they are on, they are very light and comfy. They feel like snug-fitting padded socks. I can just forget that I’m wearing them. No sliding around or hitting a hard wall in the toe box. Just incredible! Heel protection is superb. Lateral stability is good with a natural feel. The insoles are unbelievably good. I usually change the insoles of my shoes because the originals never provide enough arch support, cushioning, or booth. These do a great job. They actually get thicker towards the heel to provide more cushioning but they are thinner in the front so the shoe feels connected to the floor. (I did actually try to replace the insoles with Dr. Scholls, which were marginally better in certain aspects, but they were obviously not designed for these particular shoes so overall they did not work as well together as the originals.) I was concerned about durability because of other reviews and I do see some wear after 2 months, but not more than other shoes I had. (For reference, I play pickleball at about 3.5-4.0 level twice a week.) I also really like the heel-to-toe drop, which makes them feel like sneakers and stretch my achilles/calf muscles noticeably less providing some relief.

These Reebok Nano Court sneakers are hands down the best sneakers I’ve ever owned! The colors are insanely bright and vibrant — they totally make my outfit pop and turn heads everywhere I go. But they’re not just about looks; the comfort and support are next level.Whether I’m hitting the gym, running errands, or just out and about, these sneakers keep my feet feeling great all day long. The fit is perfect, and they’re surprisingly lightweight while still super durable.If you want sneakers that bring energy, style, and comfort to your day, don’t hesitate — these are the ones!
Amazing shoes for tennis and pickleball but this tear happened within less than 2 months. If the shoes were $40 I would be like okay but they are over $100!
Nice looking very comfortable

Great design, super comfortable, gives you a lot more balance on the court, and a sturdy footing. There does seem to be an inherent flaw in the design though because if you are using them to the max with quick collateral movements and hard play you will notice that they start to tear at a weak part on the outer edge towards the front of your foot. I’d have to say for the price they should have been a bit more durable but a year later I’m still using them, but I could imagine an advanced player running through these in a few months.
Look pretty cool, but are not comfortable. Arch doesn’t hit right. Fit is a bit narrow, doesn’t provide much slide on court.

I bought these shoes for pickleball and love them. When I first tried them on they were very snug and narrow, but after a few weeks of play, they fit perfectly. They have great lateral support and enough durability to last for some time. I like that the tongue is incorporated into the shoe so it’s all seamless and be tied to make tighter if needed. Would definitely recommend if you looking for a solid shoe both on and off the court.
These are some amazing court shoes. I use them for pickleball and they are comfortable and the best part is the toe guard for those of us that have a tennis background for those strong forehand hits

Review.review: The sneakers are perfect just as described and they fit its the right color

This style is my daughter's favorite slip on sneakers. She wears them to school everyday, and sometimes she wears them to basketball and volleyball as well.  Works all great. They are very comfortable and easy to put on, and can last for a long time. The black pair is a size 2 and it has served for almost a year, still holds up nice, but getting smaller for her feet, so I got a new size 2.5 and 3. And will continue buying. For sizing, it does run a bit roomy. Especially as the slip on style, I would suggest going half size down for a better fit.

I have active boys and have been purchasing these exact shoes for years.  They are the only ones I can find with real rubber covered foam soles instead of just foam (that's gets slippery when worn down). They also have a good variety of colors.  My oldest has red and youngest has the neon and camo.  They never complain about comfort.
Increíble calidad y comodidad, mi hijo está emocionado y feliz de tener estos zapatos.

I was attracted to these shoes due to not needing to tie shoe laces and they delivered on that end, they are very easy on and easy off and we have no issues that way. Kid is very happy with them and says they are comfortable. They are not coming apart anywhere yet, but I can see that they look very worn on the fabric part - like the logo and everything looks soft and wrinkled and just run down already and it's only been two months. I will say that our kids are more active than most outside and are very tough on any shoes, but I don't foresee these lasting into the school year. For the price and ease of use, I would buy them again, but if you're looking for something that will last for the long haul, this isn't it.
These fit really well and quality felt good - my sons really likes them and wears them all the time and so far they have lasted well 2 months in!
I needed a quick shoe to wear to and from the store that was easy to put on and looks nice. I am impressed with how comfortable these shoes are.

These are very cute sneakers. I purchased a 13 since my child wears a 12.5, but they fit her as if they were a size 12. I ended up gifting them to my coworker whose daughter wears a 10 instead of returning. It could just be the way Reebok does their sizing. All in all they are very cute sneakers that seem to be very comfortable, just size up a bit.

I love these shoes! I’ve bought them in-person before for $80, so getting them at half the price was awesome. They seem to be authentic and have the memory foam sole insert that I’ve always had and loved. Definitely worth it!

I should have read more reviews before buying, however I was too excited these shoes were on sale to really think about it!The shoes are cute, stylish, modern; something hard to find with most white sneakers bordering geriatric/orthopedic make with lifts and platforms. I was looking for something that was firm, thick soled, and preferably faux-leather-esque. These fit that bill to a T. All except for how incredibly narrow they were when I finally got them. I ordered a half size up, as someone who walks everywhere and for good amounts of distance each day, I thought maybe they'd be perfect. For a size 7 women's shoes, I struggled to get my whole foot inside, and even all the way in I was horribly uncomfortable. Walking did not help, in fact it made my arches aches something fierce.My excitement got the better of me, I'd waited months for the shoes to go on sale and when they did, just in time for my birthday, I jumped at the chance.Definitely order a size full size up or look for a wide version if available; especially if you're like me and walk everywhere.

title: Reebok Women's Nano X5 Sneaker

Review.review: I’ve been using the Nano X5s for my HYROX training, and they’ve been amazing. I have been researching shoes that are not for running but for indoor/outdoor cross-fit training, which requires both lightweight and harder soles for weight training.The stability is incredible during sled pushes and wall balls, and they still feel light and responsive enough for running segments. I also love how snug and supportive they are without being too stiff. The grip is solid on all surfaces, and I haven’t had any issues with slipping, even during burpee broad jumps or farmer carries. If you’re doing functional fitness or hybrid races like HYROX, these are a great choice.

These fit so strange. They are very wide set (granted I have very narrow feet) but I ordered my normal 7 and even with the thickets of socks I would be absolutely swimming in there. Such a bummer because they’re so cute and I think they would’ve been good for Zumba based on everything else about the shoe. Damn my narrow feet 😩
I love it! My favorite shoes

Review.review: A Gen X favorite.  Stylish and comfortable kick. If you know how to wears these, you already know. I wanted to buy the black ones but the price is too expensive.  This style of shoe is worth anything between 60-65 dollars anything less than that is a hell of a bargain, it has that nostalgic feel. Reasonably priced its a excellent buy. Update: I caught the black ones on sale for 30% off and paid 55 dollars for them. Again, Excellent buy for comfort, style and nostalgia. Quality without killing yourself in the pockets. And they don’t look like the blanket/tent sneakers the kids wear today. Reebok always put out a quality product, they just refused to go crazy and kept it conservative. I like it.Thank you.1 Samuel 17:39 And David girded his sword upon his armour, and he assayed to go; for HE HAD NOT PROVED IT. And David said unto Saul, I cannot go with these; for I have not proved them. And David put them off him.1 Samuel 17:40 And he took his staff in his hand, and chose him five smooth stones out of the brook, and put them in a shepherd's bag which he had, even in a scrip; and his sling was in his hand: and he drew near to the Philistine.Stick to the proven.
A solid, stable work out shoe.  Could be a bit wider across the toes.

I'm a  Reebok Classic fan. These are actually my preferred workout shoe. Mostly because they're all leather and I need the support that they provide over  the cloth shoes that are so popular nowadays. And then there's the wrap-around soles. I've found that they don't get caught on any parts of my various pieces of exercise equipment.I had a problem with the soles of my other Reebok shoes getting caught on the foot supports of my rowing machine. These resolved that issue and because they're made of leather, after I've worked out in them a few times they soften up and mold to me feet. This makes for a custom fit - and I love it! I caught them on sale for forty bucks so I have a new pair waiting for me to wear out my current pair. And believe me I will! :-)

They are some good-looking shoes and I really like them. I would recommend going a size up because they run slightly small. The white and red colorway is particularly nice.For some reason, my pair were a bit scuffed and had visible glue marks. I'll update my review when I've worn them for longer.

These sneakers are fabulous, they are sleek, fit are true to size but a tiny bit fitted, nevertheless, they can still be worn if you buy your exact size. The look is just as in the pic, excellent quality!

stiff and somewhat tight in the front but shouldbreak in fine, quality isn't awesome as there are a few glue globs and a spot where there is not enough glue and the logo looks a little patchy but for the price I paid (35$) the seems decent, I like the materials so far I will update if they fall apart but I expect to have to reglue the soel in a few monthsUpdate " outside holding up well after a couple months of heavy use however the inside is pilling a lot and I've worn a hole in part of the inside where my pinky toe rests, overall decent shoe 3/5 wish the inside was holding up better

I really like this shoe. I don't always enjoy the endurance of some brands in the plus size I need. These, however, lasted me forever it feels like. I started wearing them as my work shoes because they were comfortable and purchased a second pair for errands or occasions.

Saw a review from a website saying it was a good all-around cross trainer and great for HIIT because of the grippy-ness of the sole. Well, the only thing about this shoe that was ok was the grippy sole. These sneakers felt like stiff boards on my feet. The toe box would not bend and the way it felt when doing a lunge was painful. I even bought a size down or so because the reviews said it ran big. It was still oversized even for my wide foot and it still was uncomfortable because the whole shoe was not pliable to move in. I've purchased enough shoes in my lifetime to know if the material will loosen up with time and wear. I knew these sneakers would not ever feel good. So, back they went.

Review.review: These shoes are so comfortable! They fit very well, are light weight and do not slip at all. Great for walking or just wearing around. The fabric is stretchy and molds to your feet. This is my 2nd pair in this style, highly recommend!

Way back when there was a transit strike in NYC and professional women started walking to work in sneakers and switching to shoes in the office, these shoes--or ones just like them--were really popular. I started wearing them for the long walk during the strike, and didn't stop. Every few years I would buy an identical new pair to replace ones that were getting shabby. And then I couldn't find them any more, although from time to time  I'd search again. Well, here they are! I have been trying every sneaker--Hoka, On Cloud, cushioned Converse, you name it, I've tried but kept wishing for something less bulky, less crazy looking, more comfortable. These arrived today and they are just as I remember--perfect fit in my usual size, really comfortable, on and on. I'm ordering a couple more because I'm so afraid they'll disappear again. Also trying a high top version, which will be better for hiking. I feel like I'm finally ready to get back to traveling with extremely comfortable all-day walking shoes that could also go off road onto trails--or look ok in a restaurant.

In the last 6 months I have discovered that finding a pair of breathable hard toe shoes, that also are actually wide, and have arch support is apparently to much to ask.  I will admit I have an odd size foot at 11.5 4E, I've tried atleast 12 different brands now and to this point these shoes are the only one that comes close to fitting my size.  Most notably for me, they have a wide enough toe box that I can walk a lot and not get blisters, note that they are not perfect, however if you need some breathability as well these might be your best bet.  I also got the composite toe and it's been light enough not to really notice and does not set off metal detectors.Note:  if you have a flat or fallen arch the support may be great for you, that said if you have any arch, or like me have a decent arch you will want to like at getting an insert or additional support.  For this reason I've rated it a 4/5 stars, I have worn Reebok shoes before and these by far have the least comfortable insole of any I've worn before.  I think it has to do with the materials they used to help them be rated for industrial use, that said I still find it hard to beleive that Reebok would approve a shoe with such a lack of support.Overall, if your looking for a safety she that has a wide toe box, is breathable, and has a composite toe you probably wont find a better option.  I recommend using Amazon Wardrobe to try these out, I could not find anyone that had these in stock to try on and out city us a decent size.

title: Reebok Women's Classic Renaissance Sneakers
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable, well-made, and appreciate their classic leather look. The shoes offer good arch support and are considered good value for money. However, customers disagree on the fit, with some finding them too narrow. Moreover, the cushioning receives mixed reviews, with some finding them very cushiony while others say they're too stiff. Additionally, several customers report foot pain, particularly mentioning that they hurt their feet and cause knee discomfort.

Review.review: Let me tell you about these shoes.  These run about 1/2 size too small. The width is accurate; however it is necessary to get the proper width because they don't give and relax like leather shoes .  The synthetic leather is sewn over a non giving Inner  "shoe".  That firm inner liner gives these gym shoes a lot of support and structure.  These will hold their shape for the life of the shoes.  They are very sturdy.  There is a band around the front of the shoe.  That gives additional structure.  They have a cushioned insole.  They have good arch support.  It supports exactly where it should on the arches. The tongue is padded and the heel area is padded.  The laces aren't overly long.  The gym shoes are lightweight.  On the feet, they look like good leather gym shoes.  They don't get those ugly creases in them.The insole is comfortable.  The synthetic leather is soft, but that is not felt because it is sewn over that inner shoe. The inner liner is soft, but firm.  The top of the shoe, before the laces have some "play".  That one area is softer. The rest of the  shoe is firm, non giving and will stay that way by design.  That's why getting the proper width is important.  The feet feel very supported.  These are nothing like those popular mesh gym shoes.Now, there are  two sole attached to these shoes. The first is flexible.  The second is not. It does not give.  It feels hard while walking.  The second sole is the one that is treaded.  It is deeply treadedThese shoes are not for running.  For anyone that has lost a lot of knee cartilage just know the last sole is  hard and inflexible.  If it wasn't,  these would be an absolute dream come true for anyone with knee issues.  Since it is so firm, initially they don't maneuver  easily in all directions while walking.  That's important for anyone with knee problems. They do absorb shock  and have lots of cushioning. The entire sole is almost 2".  They are well worth trying, because they absorb so much shock and pressure off the knees  while walking. Note the photos;  the heel is designed so that  wearer has to heel strike first.  It's not an option. That is the proper way to begin walking.  That takes further pressure off the knee joint......I'm a Massage Therapist.I really don't think you will find a better shock absorbing shoe.  The more you walk in them the more thick cushioned sole is felt; the less the hard sole is felt,  and the feet are able to adjust to movement in all directions.  When first trying them on they just feel so hard.  That leaves after about a day of wearing.  After first trying them on my initial reactions was to send them right back.  Don't get discouraged when first trying them on.  Give them a chance. The knees will thank you.This is a good pair of shoes for people without knee problems for sure.  These make good works shoes  and they really look attractive, too.  I love the way they look, especially the all white.  It's a bright true white.  They look so fresh.  They make a nice  dress up gym shoe for me.  I know I'm glad I found them and I hope this review helps someone else.I purchased the white and black. For whatever reason the black runs a little smaller than the white.  I noticed that is true of Reebok's Princess Lite shoe as well.

I love these shoes! After having problems with my feet (specifically a heel spur), I upgraded my footwear for both at work and at the gym. I bought 2 different brands, one of which was these shoes. I wore the other pair to work (where I am on my feet the most) and this pair to the gym. After a few weeks, I bought a second pair so that I could have a pair for work and the gym! This pair was superior to the other brand I bought (I’m not naming the other brand because I don’t have beef with them; I just love these Reeboks). My feet are not hurting at all like they were before buying these shoes! Plus they look great too! The quality and value for the price is unmatched in my opinion!The only things I will mention that some may not like, but that don’t bother me at all, these shoes are a bit hot. They are fully lined, padded leather, which I think is super comfy, but they do get hot. But I have completely gotten use to that now. They are a bit narrow, so if you like a roomy toe box, you should try to find them in a wide version. I typically wear a size 7.5US in sneakers, but I got these in 7US and they fit great.
I bought these tennis for my mom whose feet are a bit wide and they fit perfectly. She felt more comfort since her feet do not suffer to be into a ¨regular shoe¨ .
Fantastic shoes. They are still in perfect condition since I only wear them to decent places. I wear my old shoes for just about everything else.
Very comfortable after I broke them in match anything love them

I loved Reeboks in the 80's and wanted to try them again.I ordered a different style from these first, to wear mowing.  I love the way they feel and they will be perfect for yard work.  I ordered a regular size 8 and they fit like a glove.I wanted a slightly different style for just plain walking, etc. so I ordered these.  I had read the other reviews about their being tight, but I completely disregarded them because I had already received the aforementioned pair which fit perfectly.  Also, I figured if these fit a little snug, I would stretch them out over time.  Last, the term "X-wide" left visions of clown shoes in my head.  Big mistake!When the regular size arrived last week, they were VERY tight.  There was no way I could have worn them for any length of time.  I had to send the regular size 8 ones of these back immediately and received the replacement size 8 X-wide ones today.  HUGE improvement!  They feel great, look great and will be perfect for my needs. If you normally wear a narrow size, these shoes will work for you.  Otherwise, order the X-wide!Love my new Reeboks and can't wait to hit the ground in them!

Review.review: The Reebok Men’s Club Memt Gum Classic shoes really deliver on both style and performance. The quality of the leather and gum sole feels premium, while still being lightweight and breathable, which is a big plus for warmer days.In terms of fit, they run true to size and feel secure without being too tight. Durability also stands out, since the build feels sturdy and made to last with regular wear.What makes it even better is the value for money. You’re getting a well-made, stylish shoe that combines comfort, wearability, and long-lasting quality without breaking the bank.

title: Reebok Women's Club C Double Revenge Sneakers
Customer_say: Customers find these sneakers comfortable, cute, and trendy, with a perfect white color and good durability that holds up surprisingly well. They are perfect for everyday wear and go with literally anything. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say they run true to size, others mention they run narrow. The stiffness also gets mixed reviews, with some finding them soft while others say they feel stiff.

Review.review: Review: Reebok Club C Double Platform SneakersI’ve been wearing the Reebok Club C Double Platform sneakers for a while now, and they’ve definitely become a go-to in my rotation. If you’re into classic silhouettes with a modern twist, these are a great choice.Style:The platform sole gives the traditional Club C design a fresh, elevated look—literally. It adds just the right amount of height without feeling over-the-top. They pair well with everything from joggers and jeans to dresses and skirts, which makes them super versatile for casual or slightly dressed-up looks.Comfort:Surprisingly comfy for a platform sneaker. The cushioning is solid, and the shoe feels stable and supportive, even after a long day on your feet. I wouldn’t call them ultra-lightweight, but they’re definitely not clunky either.Fit:They run true to size in my experience. The leather upper is snug at first but breaks in nicely after a few wears. If you have wider feet, you might want to consider going half a size up, especially if you wear thick socks.Quality:Reebok did a great job with the materials—good leather, clean stitching, and a durable sole that holds up well. They’re easy to clean too, which is a bonus if you like that fresh-out-the-box look.Final Verdict:If you’re looking for a sneaker that balances retro vibes with a modern edge, the Reebok Club C Double Platform is a solid pick. Stylish, comfortable, and versatile—definitely worth it.⸻

title: Reebok Work Zig Pulse Work Sneaker CT Men's Oxford
Customer_say: Customers find these work shoes comfortable, lightweight, and appreciate their protective features, with one customer specifically noting the composite safety toe cap. They receive positive feedback for their slip resistance, with one customer mentioning good grip to the ground. The build quality and sizing receive mixed reviews - while some find them nice, others complain about poor insoles, and while some say they run large, others report they're not true to size. The durability is concerning, with multiple customers reporting the shoes falling apart within weeks of use.

Review.review: Seems to be great. Very comfortable.  As always with any reebok shoe I ordered a size 12 because they run small. In pretty much all other brand shoe I wear a 11 us size so bear that in mind when you purchase.  If you use the size guide and put in your normal size it will tell you the same size is recommended but do not do this as it will not be enough to room. Goe one size bigger for good toe room

These shoes are pretty good. I love the fit. They are a little longer. Then my other pair of shoes. So I had to buy a size smaller, but all in all these shoes work really well.
